tgt_text: Noko kunjalo, kufuneka singayekeleli umxakatho njengoko i-COVID-19 isagquba.

src_text: Re tshwanetse gape go tswelela go tlhapa diatla gongwe go dirisa sebolayaditwatsi, le go katogana le go dira gore mafelo re leng mo go ona tlhabiwe ke phefo..     Moento go ya ka bopaki jwa saense santse le ona o gaisang mo go re sireletseng mo bolwetseng jwa COVID-19 mme Kabinete rotloetsa batho botlhe ba ba sa entiwang gore ba se senye nako mme ba ye go enta mme ba ba entilweng bone ba ye go tlhabela moento wa go tsosolosa ba tlhabileng kwa lefelong le le gaufi nabo la go tlhabela moento ntle le go duelela tirelo eo..     Monkeypox.
tgt_text: Nangona eli lizwe likuphelisile ukunxitywa ngokunyanzelekileyo kwesifonyo esidlangalaleni, abantu abanezifo ezinganyangekiyo kunye nabo bagulayo bayakhuthazwa ukuba baqhubeleke nokunxiba izifonyo.

src_text: Kabinete reboletswe tshedimosetso e mabapi le bolwetsi jwa Monkeypox ya gore ka fa nageng go setse go fitlhetswe batho ba le babedi ba ba nang le bolwetsi jwa Monkeypox mo nageng go latela gore fa gautshwane go fitlhelwe motho wa bobedi.
tgt_text: Futhi kufuneka siqhubeleke nokuhlamba izandla okanye nokuzifefa ngesibulala-ntsholongwane, futhi singasondelelani zize neendawo esikuzo zibethe umoya..     Ugonyo lixhadi esinalo elikuphela kwalo eliqinisekisiweyo zinzululwazi lokulwa i-COVID-19 kwaye iKhabhinethi ikhuthaza bonke abantu abangagonywanga ukuba baye kugonya ngokukhawuleza baze bona abo sele begonyiwe baye kufumana ichiza elisimahla lokomeleza amajoni omzimba kumaziko akufutshane okugonya.

src_text: Batho bano ba itlhaotse mo setšhabeng mme ba kwa magaeng bona mme go samaganwe le dithulaganyo tsa go gata motlhala batho bao ba ka tswang ba kopane le batho bano go lekola gore ga ba tshwaetsega..     Lefapha la Boitekanelo le Setheo sa Bosetšhaba sa Malwetse a Tshelanwang ba dirisana le Mokgatlho wa Lefatshe wa Boitekanelo go sekaseka matshosetsi go tshelana ka bolwetse jono ka fa nageng gore tsamaisane le Melawana ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Boitekanelo..     Mogare wa monkeypox ga tshelane bonolo mme gantsi tshelana fa batho ba ka tshwarana go tshwana le go sunana, go tlampurelana gongwe go kgoma dikarolo tsa mmele tse di nang le dintho tsa monkeypox.
tgt_text: Isifo i-Monkeypox.

src_text: Batho ba ba se nang matshwao monkeypox ba ka se ke ba tshela batho ba bangwe ka mogare ono..     Kabinete eletsa batho ba ba itemogelang matshwao letshoroma, matshwao a tshwanang le mokgotlhwane a latelwang ke boswata jo bo nang le metsi go ya kwa maokelong a gaufi gore ba bone thuso le kalafi ka bonako.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi inikwe ingxelo malunga nezintsha ngokunwenwa kwesifo se-Monkeypox kweli lizwe emva kokufunyanwa komntu wesibini onesi sifo kweli lizwe.

src_text: Matlhotlhapelo thabene ya East London.
tgt_text: Aba bantu bafunywenwe banesi sifo kungokunje bazivalele bodwa kumawabo kwaye kusalandelelwa kubo bonke abantu abadibene nabo ukukhangela ukuba ingaba bakhona na abanye abantu abosulelwe sesi sifo.

src_text: Matlhotlhapelo kwa Thabeneng ya Enyobeni kwa East London kwa Kapa Botlhaba ka Latshipi, 26 Seetebosigo 2022 a tsereng matshelo bašwa ba le 21 hutsafaditse naga yotlhe.
tgt_text: ISebe lezeMpilo kunye neZiko leSizwe leziFo ezoSulelayo (i-NICD) basebenzisana noMbutho wezeMpilo weHlabathi (i-WHO) ukujonga amathuba okunwenwa kwesi sifo kweli njengoko isitsho iMigaqo yezeMpilo yeHlabathi.

src_text: Ga go bonolo go akanya ka manyaapelo malapa a latlhegetsweng ke bana ka tsela e botlhoko jalo..     Kabinete rometse matshediso go malapa a latlhegetsweng ke ba malapa mme ya leboga botlhe ka tshegetso ya setho e neilweng malapa a mo khutsafalong ka nako eno e boima..     Ke selo se se re tshwenyang gore bana ba bonnye jwa dingwaga tse 13 ba ne ba letleletswe go tsena mo lefelong leo gore ba tle go nwa notagi.
tgt_text: Intsholongwane ye-monkeypox ayosuleli lula, yosulela xa abantu bethe basondelelana kakhulu besenza izinto ezifana nokuphuzana, ukucofa-cofana okanye ukubamba-bambana amalungu omzimba anamaqhakuva esi sifo.

src_text: Re ikuela mo baaging botlhe go nna le seabe ka go dira gore bana ba rona ba babalesege ka dinako tsotlhe..     Bana ba ba nang le dingwaga tse di ka fa tlase ga di le 18 ga ba letlelelwa go tsena mo dithabeneng, dišabining, dibareng le kwa marekisetsong bojalwa.
tgt_text: Abantu abangenazimpawu ze-monkeypox abayisasazi le ntsholongwane..     IKhabhinethi icebisa abantu ababonakalisa iimpawu zomkhuhlane ezithi zilandelwe ngamaqhakuva angathi ngamadyunguza ukuba baye kwiziko lezempilo elikufutshane ukuze baxilongwe baze banyangwe.

src_text: Barekisi ba nnotagi ba ba fitlhelwang ba tlola melao eno ba tla latofadiwa ka bosenyi mme ba tseelwa dilaesense tsa bona tsa go rekisa notagi..
tgt_text: Inyhikityha enyenzeke kwibhari yaseMonti.

src_text: Se se Tswileng mo Samiting ya Setlhopha sa Baeteledipele ba Dinaga tse Supa (G7).
tgt_text: Inyhikityha embi eyenzeke e-Enyobeni eMonti kwiphondo laseMpuma Koloni ngeCawe, umhla wama-26 kweyeSilimela 2022 apho kusweleke abantu abatsha abangama-21, ilishiye eli lizwe lidandathekile.

src_text: Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa nnile le seabe kwa Samiting ya Baeteledipele ba G7 e neng tshwaretswe kwa Bavaria, Jeremane ka Mosupologo, 27 Sedimonthole.
tgt_text: Ayinakulinganiswa intlungu azibona ekuyo la makhaya ashiywe ngabantwana bawo kabuhlungu kangaka..     IKhabhinethi ithi akuhlanga lungehliyo kwiintsapho eziphantsi kwelifu elimnyama kwaye ibulela wonke umntu othe wanikezela ngoncedo lwezentlalontle kwezi ntsapho zisentlungwini.

src_text: Moporesidente – yo nnileng le seabe mo dikopanong tse mo go tsona go buisanweng ka merero ya tlelaemete, motlakase, boitekanelo, go nna teng ga dijo mo lefatsheng le merero ya tekatekano ya bong – ne laleditswe ke moamogelabaeng, Motšhanselara Olaf Scholz..     G7 ke foramo ya sepolotiki ya dipuso e gogwang kwa pele ke naga ya Canada, Fora, Jeremane, Itali, Japane, Borithane le Amerika     Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: Iyaxhalabisa into yokuba iimveku ezineminyaka eli-13 zivunyelwe ukuba zingene kule ndawo yentselo zize zivunyelwe nokuba zisele utywala.

src_text: Sekwalwa se Iseng se Butswe sa Melao ya Lephata la Molao (LSC).
tgt_text: Sicela uluntu ukuba nalo luncedise ludlale indima yalo ngokuthi luqinisekise ukuba abantwana bakhuselekile ngalo lonke ixesha..     Abantwana abaneminyaka engaphantsi kwe-18 abavumelekanga ukuba bangene kwiithaveni, izimokolo, iipotsoyi zotywala nasezibharini.

src_text: Kabinete letleletse gore LSC ka phasaladiwa gore baagi ba ntshe se se mo mafatlheng bona ka go sona.
tgt_text: Oosomashishini botywala abafunyaniswe besophula nawuphi na kule mithetho baza kubekwa ityala zize iilayisenisi zabo zotywala zithathwe.

src_text: Maikemisetso melawana eno ke go bebofatsa diphetogo mo lephateng la molao go dira gore ditheo tsa molao di nne le kemedi go ya ka sebopego sa baagi ka fa nageng.
tgt_text: Iziphumo zeNgqungquthela yeeNkokeli zamaZwe aTyebileyo asi-7 (i-G7).

src_text: Molao ono tla netefatsa gape le gore go dirwa setheo se se tla tlhagisang batlamedi ba ditirelo tsa molao ba ba katisitsweng go utlwagala le ba ba itseng tiro ya bona ka botlalo.
tgt_text: UMongameli Cyril Ramaphosa uthabathe inxaxheba kwiNgqungquthela yeeNkokheli ze-G7 ebibanjelwe e-Bavaria, e-Germany, ngomhla wama-27 kweyeSilimela.

src_text: Letsholo la go kwadiwa ga LSC le ne le okametswe ke Lekgotla la Tiro ya Molao, setheo sa semolao se se tlhamilweng go ya ka Karolo ya bo 4 ya Molao wa Tiro ya Molao, wa ngwaga wa 2014 (Molao wa bo 28 wa 2014) mmogo le go kaelwa ke Molao wa Matlafatso ya Maemo Ikonomi Bathobatsho (B-BBEE), wa ngwaga wa 2013 (Molao wa bo 46 wa 2013).
tgt_text: UMongameli – othathe inxaxheba kwiintlanganiso ebezigwadla imiba enxulumene nemozulu, ezamandla, ezempilo, amaphulo okuqinisekiswa ukuba kukho ukutya okwaneleyo kwihlabathi kunye nolingwano ngokwesini – ebemenywe yiNgqonyela u-Olaf Scholz, ebinguye ebesingathe le Ngqungquthela.

src_text: Molao wa B-BBEE wa 2013 rwesa Tona ya Kgwebisano, Indaseteri le Kgaisano maikarabelo go kwala melao ya tiro e tswileng diatla mo go diragatseng matlafatso ya maemo ikonomi mo bathobantshong mo maphateng a rileng.
tgt_text: I-G7 liqumrhu lezopolitiko loorhulumene abahlukeneyo eliquka i-Canada, France, Germany, Italy, Japan, United Kingdom kunye ne-United States     Izigqibo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Ga jaana ditokololo tsa porofešene ya molao ga di na molao o di kaelang mo go samaganeng le go tlhoka tekatekano mo porofešeneng ya molao.
tgt_text: ImiGaqo eYilwayo yeCandelo lezoMthetho (i-LSC eYilwayo).

src_text: LSC tla phatlaladiwa mo Kaseteng ya Puso matsatsi le 60 go letla gore baagi ba ntshe se se mo mafatlheng bona ka go sona..     Dipegelo tse di Rebolwang Gabedi mo Ngwageng tsa Kgatelopele ya Tiro e Dirilweng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivumile ukuba ipapashwe i-LSC eYilwayo ukuze uluntu luhlomle.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dipegelo tse di rebolwang gabedi mo ngwageng tsa kgatelopele ya tiro e dirilweng tsa paka e akaretsang Diphalane 2021 go fitlha Mopitlwe.
tgt_text: Iinjongo zale migaqo kukukhokela amaphulo okwenza iinguqu kwicandelo lezomthetho ukuze zonke iintlanga zeli lizwe zikwazi ukuthatha inxaxheba kulo ngokulinganayo.

src_text: Dipegelo tseno ke karolo ya Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro ya Pakagare (MSTF) 2019-.
tgt_text: Le migaqo iza kuqinisekisa nokuba kuswekwa iqumrhu eliza kuvelisa iingcali zezomthetho eziqeqeshwe zacokiswa futhi nezinezakhono ezigqibeleleyo.

src_text: MTSF 2019-2024 ke leano la go diragatsa tiro bile gape le disa leano la go tsamaisa tiro ya go dira gore re diragatse Leano la Tlhabololo ya Naga leng Ponelopele ya 2030 e ka ga dilo tse di botlhokwa tse di tshwanetseng go fitlhelelwa mo pusong e busang ga jaanong ya borataro.
tgt_text: Inkqubo yokuqulunqa le-LSC iYilwayo ibikhokelwa liBhunga leCandelo lezoMthetho, eliliqumrhu elisemthethweni elisekwe ngokweCandelo 4 loMthetho weCandelo lezoMthetho, wowama-2014 (uMthetho uNombl 28 wowama-2014) likhokelwa nguMthetho woPhuhliso oluBanzi lwabaMnyama ngezoQoqosho (i-B-BBEE), wowama-2013 (uMthetho uNombl 46 wowama-2013).

src_text: Dipegelo tseno di bua ka dikarolo tse di botlhokwa di le supa tsa puso leng (1) Phetogo ya ikonomi le go tlhola ditiro; (2) Thuto, bokgoni le boitekanelo; (3) Go tiisa megolo ya go thusa baagi ka ditirelo tsa motheo tse di ikanyegang le tsa boleng; (4) Kgolaganyo ya dibaka, bonno le pusoselegae; (5) Go nna seoposengwe le go babalela baagi; (6) Mmuso o nang le bokgoni o nang le maitsholo a siameng le o tlisang tlhabologo; le (7) Aforika o botoka le lefatshe le le botoka, gammogo le dikgato tsa go tlisa tharabololo tse di tshwanang le tse di tlhalositsweng tsa pusong e busang ga jaanong ya borataro..     Kabinete itumedisitswe ke kgatelopele e dirilweng mo dintlheng tse di neng di beilweng tsa paka e sekasekwang.
tgt_text: UMthetho we-B-BBEE wowama-2013 ugunyazisa uMphathiswa wezoRhwebo, uShishino noKhuphiswano ukuba akhuphe imigaqo yokuziphatha ngokufanelekileyo ngokumayelana nokuphuhliswa kwabamnyama ngezoqoqosho kumacandelo athile.

src_text: Kabinete gape nopotse le dintlha tse go santseng go saletswe morago mo go tsona ka ntlha ya leroborobo la COVID-19 tse go tlhokwang gore go samaganwe le tsona..     Ditona di tla tshwara dikopano le bobegakgang mo dibekeng tse di tlang go tlhalosa ka botlalo se dipegelo tseno di buang ka sona mmogo le go neelana ka tshedimosetso e tseneletseng ka ga dintlha tse di santseng di tlhoka go gagamadiwa     Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.
tgt_text: Amalungu ecandelo lezomthetho kungokunje awanayo imigaqo yokuziphatha yecandelo ezakuwakhokhela kumalinge okulungisa nokungalingani nokungaxhamli ngokulinganayo kwicandelo lezomthetho.

src_text: Khonferense ya Bathobantsho ba Leng Beng ba Diintaseteri le Beng ba Dikgwebo tse di Gwebang le Dinaga tsa kwa Ntle (BIEC).
tgt_text: I-LSC eYilwayo iza kupapashwa kwiGazethi kaRhulumente iintsuku ezingama-60 ukwenzela ukuba uluntu luhlomle..     Iingxelo zonyaka-mbini zenkqubo yomsebenzi.

src_text: BIEC ya ntlha tla tshwarelwa kwa Tikwatikweng ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Dikhonferense ya Sandton kwa Johannesburg ka Laboraro, 20 Phukwi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi izivumile iingxelo zikanyaka-mbini zenkqubo yomsebenzi zesithuba esisuka kwinyanga yeDwarha yowama-2021 ukuya kweyoKwindla wowama-.
Ezi ngxelo ziyinxalenye yesiCwangciso-sikhokelo esiQiqisiweyo saPhakathi koNyaka (i-MTSF) sowama-2019-.

src_text: Khonferense eno tshwarwa morago ga gore puso ngwaga ono sa le gale thankgolole Lephata la Kemonokeng ya Bathobantsho ba Leng Beng ba Diintaseteri le Beng ba Dikgwebo tse di Gwebang le Dinaga tsa kwa Ntle, le maitlhomo lona leng go tshegetsa beng ba diintaseteri ba bathobantsho gore ba kgone go rekisetsa mebaraka mentšhwa, le go thusiwa ka ditšhelete tsa dikgwebo tse di gwebang le dinaga tsa kwa ntle mmogo le go thusiwa le ka dirala tsa go bapatsa dikgwebo tsa bona     Molaetsa.
tgt_text: I-MTSF yowama-2024 sisicwangciso sokuphumeza kunye nesikhokelo sokuhlola ukuze kufezekiswe izinto ezikhokeliswe phambili zalo mbuso uthathe iintambo zolawulo ngowama-2018 zesiCwanciso soPhuhliso seSizwe (i-NDP): uMbono wama-..     Ezi ngxelo zigxininisa kwimiba ephambili esixhenxe karhulumente, eyile (1) iiNguqu kwezoQoqosho nokudalwa kwemisebenzi; (2) ezeMfundo, izakhono nezempilo; (3) Ukuhlawulwa kwezibonelelo-mali zentlalo ngokuthi kusetyenziswa iinkonzo ezisisiseko ezisemgangathweni nezithembekileyo; (4) Ukuhlaliswa kwabantu abahlukeneyo endaweni enye, ukuhlaliswa koluntu kunye norhulumente wengingqi; (5) Ukuhlalisana ngoxolo kweentlanga ezahlukeneyo nokhuseleko loluntu; (6) umbuso onezakhono, othembekileyo nokhokelisa phambili uphuhliso; kunye (7) ne-Afrika kunye nehlabathi elingcono, kunye namanye amanyathelo okungenelela alo mbuso wathatha imikhala yolawulo ngowama-..     IKhabhinethi iyayibulela inkqubela eyenziwe kwezo ndawo zithile ngokweenjongo ebezibekiwe zeli xesha kubhekiswa kulo.

src_text: DikakgoloKabinete akgotse le go eleletsa masego: Springboks, ka phenyo e gapileng maikutlo ya motsotso wa bofelo kgatlhanong le Wales ka nako ya motshameko wa ntlha wa meraro ya teko kwa Lebaleng la Metshameko la Loftus Versveld kwa Tshwane ka Lamatlhatso, 2 Phukwi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivile nangendawo ezifuna ukuba kungenelelwe ukuze kulungiswe ezi zinto zibangele ulibaziseko ebeziphazanyiswe ngubhubhane we-COVID-..     AbaPhathiswa baza kubamba iindibano noonondaba ukuba banikwe iinkcukacha ezigcweleyo ngeengxelo zabo bacacise nezo ndawo zifuna ukuba kungenelelwe     Umsitho ozayo.

src_text: Banyana Banyana, ka phenyo ya bona ya dino di le pedi go le nngwe mo motshamekong wa bona wa pulo ya metshameko ya Sejana sa Metshameko ya Kgwele ya Dinao ya Basadi sa Dinaga tsa Aforika kgatlhanong le Nigeria e tshwaretsweng kwa nageng ya Morocco, ka Mosupologo, 4 Phukwi     Go Thapiwa    Pele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang..     Ngaka Nyameko Barney Pityana jaaka Modulasetilo wa Khomišene ya Bosetšhaba ya Dilothari..     Moatefokate Rory Voller jaaka Mokhomišinara wa khomišene ya Dithoto le Dithata tsa Ditlamo (CIPC).
tgt_text: INkomfa yooSomashishini Abamnyama abaRhweba namaZwe angaPhandle (i-BIEC).

src_text: Motlakase.
tgt_text: Energy.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse ditsereganyo tse di itsisitsweng ke puso go samagana le mathata motlakase naga.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the interventions introduced by government to address the country’s energy crisis.

src_text: Dikgato tseno tsa botlhokwa di tlhagola tsela ya go fokotsa go kgaolwa ga motlakase, go fetola lephata la motlakase le go dira gore setlwaedi sa go tlhaela motlakase nne selo sa mo malobeng.
tgt_text: The far-reaching measures pave the way to reduce load-shedding, transform the electricity sector and achieve long-term energy security.

src_text: Go tshegetsa mafaratlhatlha motlakase le go thusa naga ya rona gore se imelwe ke tlamelo ya motlakase, re tlhoka go fokotsa tiriso ya motlakase ya setšhaba ka dimekawate di le 600 mo dikgweding di le tharo tse di tlang..   Malapa ka nna le seabe mo go somareleng motlakase ka go tima mabone a sa dirisiweng le didiriswa tsa motlakase tse di jang motlakase montsi ka dinako tse motlakase dirisiwang ka bontsi.
tgt_text: In supporting the energy grid and helping our country through its constrained electricity supply, we need to reduce our nation’s energy consumption by 600 megawatts over the next three months..

src_text: Dikgwebo di rotloediwa go dirisa thekenoloji e sa diriseng motlakase montsi mo ditirong tsa tsona tsa tlhagiso mmogo le go nna le seabe mo dikgatong tsa go fokotsa tiriso ya motlakase..   Operation Vulindlela.
tgt_text: Households can play their part in conserving energy by switching off all non-essential lighting and high-energy appliances during peak demand times.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse kgatelopele e dirilweng ka fa tlase ga Operation Vulindlela ya go tlosa dikgoreletsi mo maphateng motlakase mafaratlhatlha ditlhaeletsano, le metsi le bojanala mo go tsosolosenga ikonomi.
tgt_text: Businesses are encouraged to adopt more energy-efficient production technology and participate in initiatives to reduce electricity demand..  Operation Vulindlela.

src_text: Go fitlheletswe diphetogo tsa ikonomi di le robongwe go tswa mo go di le 26, mme mo diphetogong di le 11 go na le kgatelopele e namatshang.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the progress made under Operation Vulindlela to clear bottlenecks across the energy, telecommunications, and water and tourism sectors to revive the economy.

src_text: Dikatlego di akaretsa go oketsa palo ya dilaesense tsa tlhagiso e golaganeng le phatlalatso, go fetolelwa ga Bothati jwa Maemelakepe Bosetšhaba Transnet go nna setlamo se se ikemetseng, go gololwa ga lenane le le sekasekilweng la dikgono tsa botlhokwa le tsenyotirisong ya tsamaiso ya e-Visa mo dinageng di le 14, go akarediwa mebaraka megolo mentšhwa ya bajanala tshwana le China, India, Kenya le Nigeria..   Go Bogisiwa le go Bolawa ga Batho ba Bomme (GBVF).
tgt_text: Nine out of the 26 structural reforms have been achieved, with 11 reforms making good progress.

src_text: Kabinete gagamaditswe tota ke ditiragalo tse di setlhogo tsa mo malobeng tsa go betelelwa ga basadi ba le robedi kwa Krugersdorp, kwa Gauteng.
tgt_text: Successes include increasing the licensing threshold for embedded generation, the corporatisation of the Transnet National Ports Authority, release of the revised critical skills list and the implementation of the e-Visa system in 14 countries, including major new tourist markets such as China, India, Kenya and Nigeria..  Gender-based violence and femicide (GBVF).

src_text: Ditiragatso tseno tse di bosula le tsa go bogisa batho ba bomme di nyatsa botho ba rona.
tgt_text: Cabinet expressed outrage at the recent brutal rape of eight women in Krugersdorp in Gauteng.

src_text: Kabinete akgotse gape le Tirelo ya Sepodisi sa Aforika Borwa ka go tshwara ka bonako babelaelwa ba le mmalwa malebana le tiragalo eno e setlhogo..     Kabinete ikuetse mo baaging go dirisana le sepodisi ka go ba loma tsebe gongwe go ba begela ka ditiragalo tse di belaetsang.
tgt_text: These vile acts and abuse against women undermine our social fabric.

src_text: Fa re dira mmogo, re ka dira gore mo metseng re tswang kwa go yona basadi le bana ba rona ba nne ba babalesegile..     MoAforika Borwa mongwe le mongwe na le maikarabelo go tsaya dikgato tsa molao kgatlhanong le ditlhokotsebe.
tgt_text: Cabinet further commended the South African Police Service for their swift arrest of number of suspects in connection with the heinous crime..

src_text: Bega ditiragalo tsotlhe tse di amanang le GBVF kwa seteišeneng sa mapodisi sa kgaolo o nnang kwa go yona gongwe letsetse nomoro ya mahala ya Crime Stop: mo go 08600 10111, gongwe letsetse Tikwatikwe ya Bosetšhaba ya go Lwantshana le GBVF: mog go 0800 428 428 gongwe letsetse Mogala wa Thuso ya go Lwantshana le go Bogisiwa ga Batho ba Bomme: mo go 0800 150. .
tgt_text: Cabinet appealed to communities to work with law-enforcement agencies by sharing any information or reporting suspicious activities.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Basadi.
tgt_text: Working together, we can make our communities safer for women and children..  Every South African has duty to act against perpetrators of violence within the ambit of the law.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Basadi ya ngwaga le ngwaga ka Phatwe tlotla basadi ba ba nnileng le seabe mo kgaratlhong ya kgololesego le basadi botlhe mo setšhabeng sa rona..   Kgwedi ya Basadi monongwaga ketekwa ka fa tlase ga moono wa: “Ditshwanelo le Maatlafatso ya Basadi mo Ikonoming le mo Setšhabeng: Re aga Botoka go Tokafatsa go Tsosologa ga Basadi”..   Basadi ba feta 20 000 ba ba gwantetseng kwa Union Buildings kwa Pretoria ka la bo 9 Phatwe 1956 ba akgetse mo go netefatseng gore tekatekano ya bong le maatlafatso di tswelela go nna ditlapele tse botlhokwa mo Aforika Borweng wa temokerasi.
tgt_text: Report all GBVF-related incidents to local police station or call the toll-free Crime Stop number: 0860 01 0111, the National GBVF Command Centre: 0800 428 428 or Stop Gender Violence Helpline: 0800 150.  .

src_text: Dikgato tsa bona tsa bopelokgale di rotloeditse basadi ka kakaretso go tsaya manno a ba siametseng mo Palamenteng, mo pusong le mo setšhabeng, mme re tswelela go agelela mo ditswelelopeleng tseno fa sale re bona kgololesego ka.
tgt_text: Women’s Month.

src_text: Segopotso sa Marikana.
tgt_text: The annual Women’s Month in August pays tribute to women who participated in the liberation struggle and all women in our society..

src_text: Ka Labobedi, 16 Phatwe 2022, puso tshwaragane le naga yotlhe go ikgopotsa matlhotlhapelo a diragetseng kwa Marikana kwa Bokone Bophirima ka ngwaga wa.
tgt_text: This year’s Women Month is being celebrated under the theme: “Women’s Socio-Economic Rights and Empowerment: Building Back Better for Women’s Improved Resilience”..

src_text: Kutlobotlhoko e utlwilweng ke badiri, bamalapa bona le setšhaba ka kakaretso tla nna le mo hisetoring ya rona..   Lenaneo la Ntšhwafatso ya Marikana le tsentswe tirisong go aga sešwa le go dira gore go nne le seemo se se kgontshang go tokafatsa matshelo baagi ba Marikana.
tgt_text: The over 20 000 women who marched to the Union Buildings in Pretoria on 9 August 1956 contributed to ensuring that gender equality and empowerment remains key priority in democratic South Africa.

src_text: Ngogola puso duetse R176 milione le tlhatswadiatla ya malapa batswasetlhabelo mme go solofetswe gore dikgetse tse di setseng ga jaana tse di mo dikgatong tsa semolao di konosediwe kwa bokhutlong jwa Phatwe.
tgt_text: Their brave actions inspired women in general to take their rightful place in Parliament, government and civil society, and we are constantly building on these advances since gaining freedom in.

src_text: Go neetswe batlholagadi ba Marikana matlo le mmalwa a ntšhwafaditsweng le a rekilweng mme mangwe tla konosediwa monongwaga.
tgt_text: Marikana commemoration.

src_text: Porojeke ya matlo ya R700 milione tla dira gore badiri ba meepo ba tlamelwe ka matlo a nang le seriti.
tgt_text: On Tuesday, 16 August 2022, government joined the rest of the country in remembering the tragedy that unfolded at Marikana in North West in.

src_text: Go tlamelwa ka mafaratlhatlha botlhokwa loago go tokafatsa seemo sa botshelo sa baagi ba kwa meepong.
tgt_text: The pain felt by the workers, their families and the nation at large would forever be entrenched in our history..

src_text: Imbizo ya Moporesidente e Tshwaretsweng kwa Gauteng e Buang ka Leano la Tiragatso ya Kabo ya Ditirelo mo Dikgaolong (DDM).
tgt_text: The Marikana Renewal Programme has been implemented to rebuild and create an enabling environment to improve the lives of the Marikana community.

src_text: Go latela katlego ya di-Imbizo tsa Moporesidente di le tharo tse di neng di tshwaretswe kwa Bokone Bophirima, Foreisetata le Mpumalanga, ka tatelano ya tsona, Lekgotlatoropo la Kgaolo la Sedibeng kwa Gauteng le ne la amogela legato la bone ka Labotlhano, 12 Phatwe..   Ka fa tlase ga moono wa: “Se tlogele ope kwa morago”, Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa ne eteletse pele baemedi ba batlhankedibagolwane go tswa kwa pusong ya bosetšhaba, ya porofense le ya selegae.
tgt_text: Last year government paid R176 million in compensation to the families of the victims and the remaining cases under litigation are expected to be finalised by the end of August number of renovated or newly acquired houses have been handed to the Marikana widows and others will be completed this year R700-million housing project will see mineworkers being provided with decent housing.

src_text: MaAforika Borwa go tswa kwa maphateng a farologaneng ne rotloediwa go dira mmogo kgatlhanong le seelo se se golang sa lehuma le khumanego tse di bakwang ke maemo a gwetlhang ikonomi..   Kgaolo ya Sedibeng nnile le tswelelopele ka go dirisa Kgaolo ya Ikonomi e Kgethegileng ya Vaal River (SEZ) e nang le bokgoni jwa go fetolela kgaolo eo, porofense le naga go nna ya madirelo gape.
tgt_text: Critical social infrastructure is being provided to improve the living conditions of mining communities.

src_text: Maikaelelo Vaal River SEZ ke go amogela maphata a latelang botlhokwa: Vaal River Smart City ntšhwa, Kutla ya Green Hydrogen Innovation; kutla ya motekwane/khanabisi; tsamaiso ya dithoto tsa temothuo (agro-logistics); eroteropolisi; boemelafofanepotlana; thomelothoto ka difofane le lephata le le tsosolositsweng la tlhagiso ya tshipi.

tgt_text: District Development Model (DDM) Presidential Imbizo in Gauteng.

src_text: Samiti ya Moporesidente e ka ga Lephata la go tswa Baagi Thuso.
tgt_text: Following the success of the previous three DDM Presidential Izimbizo hosted in North West, Free State and Mpumalanga respectively, the Sedibeng District Municipality in Gauteng hosted the fourth instalment on Friday, 12 August..

src_text: Samiti ya Moporesidente e ka ga Lephata la go tswa Baagi Thuso e neng tshwaretswe kwa Ekurhuleni, Gauteng go tloga ka la bo 4 go fitlha ka la bo 5 Phatwe 2022 ka fa tlase ga moono wa: “Go Diragatsa Dikgato tsa go Tshwaraganya Setšhaba go Dira gore Baagi ba nne le Seabe mo Ditiragalong tsa go tswa Baagi Thuso tse di Nang le Seabe mo Ikonoming” kopantse batho botlhe ba ba amegang go tswa kwa dikhutlong tsotlhe tsa naga tse di nang le seabe mo mererong ya mothale ono, gore ba tle go dirisana mmogo le puso go samagana le dikgwetlho tsa ikonomi le tsa baagi mme gareng ga maikemisetso mangwe mantsi, le go batlela mekgatlho ya go ema baagi nokeng didirisiwa tsotlhe tse di tlhokang go thusa baagi..     Samiti sekasekane le dipegelo tsa dipuisano go tswa kwa diporofenseng di le robongwe malebana le dikgwetlho tsa tsona, tse di akareditseng tlamelo ya matlole, matsapa melawanataolo, go fetola lekala la go tswa baagi thuso ka maikaelelo go dira gore go nne le tirisanommogo magareng ga puso le mekgatlo ya baagi go samagana le dikgwetlho tse di amanang le lehuma, go tlhoka tekatekano le botlhokatiro..   Kabinete ikuetse kwa mekgatlhong ya baagi le mo baaging go nna le seabe se se tlhaga go netefatsa gore re aga isago e botoka, jaaka go elediwa mo Leanong la Tlhabololo ya Naga: Mo ponelopeleng ya   Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: Under the theme: “Leave no one behind”, President Cyril Ramaphosa led the delegation of senior officials from the national, provincial and local governments.

src_text: Leano le Legolo la Intaseteri ya Merero ya Setso le ya Boitlhamedi.
tgt_text: South Africans in their various formations and sectors were mobilised to act together against rising levels of poverty and destitution caused by the challenging economic conditions..

src_text: Kabinete amogetse Leano le Legolo la Intaseteri ya Merero ya Setso le ya Boitlhamedi gore tsenngwe tirisong.
tgt_text: The Sedibeng District has made progress in operationalising the Vaal River Special Economic Zone (SEZ), which holds potential for the reindustrialisation of the region, province and country.

src_text: Leano leno le tsepamisitse mogopolo mo tirong ntle ya ditshwantsho le dibidio; ya go bopa le go betla; ya dikgaso tse di reediwang le tse di bogelwang mmogo le ya metlotlo; ya ditirelo tsa mebetlo le tsa boitlhamedi; ya go diragatsa le ya go keteka, go akarediwa le ya mmino, ya go phasalatsa le ya dikgatiso..   Leano leno le tla tswela maphata ano mosola mo go direng gore re nne le lekala le le fetogileng le le kgonang go itlhamela le go itshimololela dilo le le tla tlhomphiwang mo lefatsheng le go gaisana le mangwe mo lekaleng leno.
tgt_text: The Vaal River SEZ plans to host the following critical sectors: The new Vaal River Smart City; Green Hydrogen Innovation Hub; cannabis hub; agro-logistics; aerotropolis; aerodrome; air freight and the revitalised steel manufacturing sector.

src_text: Le tla tswela mosola intaseteri ya boitlhamedi ya Aforika Borwa gore kgone go fitlhelela mebaraka ya ka fa nageng le ya dinaga tsa boditšhabatšhaba.

tgt_text: Presidential Social Sector Summit.

src_text: Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro le le Ntšhwafaditsweng la Pholisi ya Madi Dikadimo tsa Dimasepala le go Samagana le Merero ya Tshoganyetso.
tgt_text: The Presidential Social Sector Summit held in Ekurhuleni, Gauteng from 4 to 5 August 2022 under the theme: “Fostering Social Cohesion to Enable Socio-Economic Participation in Communities”, brought together stakeholders from different constituencies to work with government to address socio-economic challenges and mobilise resources for civil society, among other objectives..

src_text: Kabinete amogetse dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa tsa Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro le le Ntšhwafaditsweng la Pholisi ya Madi Dikadimo tsa Dimasepala le go Samagana le Merero ya Tshoganyetso.
tgt_text: The summit considered dialogue reports from the nine provinces on their challenges, which included access to funding, regulatory issues, transformation of the social sector with view to fostering state-civil society partnership to address challenges related to poverty, inequality and unemployment..

src_text: Dikarolo tseno tota di mo karolong ya madi dikadimo mo leanong leno.
tgt_text: Cabinet called on civil-society organisations and citizens to play their active part in ensuring that we build better tomorrow, as envisioned in the National Development Plan: Vision  Cabinet Decisions.

src_text: Mo dikarolong tseno, go tshitshintswe gore go atisewe paka ya go duelela madi a adimilweng gore tsamaelana le paka ya tse dingwe tsa dithoto tse di rekilweng ka tšhelete eo.
tgt_text: Cultural and Creative Industries Masterplan.

src_text: Dikarolo tseno gape di tlhalosa seabe sa ditheo tsa ditšhelete tsa tlhabololo mo go adimeng dimasepala matlole.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the Cultural and Creative Industries Masterplan for implementation.

src_text: Karolo ya bo 230 ya Molaotheo wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa wa 1996 naya dimasepala dithata tsa go adima tšhelete ya ditshenyegelo tsa tsona.
tgt_text: The masterplan focuses on visual arts; crafts and design; audio-visual and interactive media; design and creative services; performance and celebration, including music, publishing and printed media..

src_text: Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro la ntlhantlha le amogetswe ke Kabinete ka ngwaga wa 2000 go kaela Kgaolo ya bo 6 le ya bo 13 ya Molao wa Ditšhelete tsa Dimasepala, wa ngwaga wa 2003 (Molao wa bo 56 wa 2003).
tgt_text: The masterplan will intervene in these sectors towards building transformed creative innovative sector that will be globally recognised and competitive in the space.

src_text: Maitlhomo dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa ke go dira gore baadimi ba bangwe ba bantsinyana mo mebasepaleng ba bone merokotso fa ka fa letlhakoreng le lengwe di tswelela go se setise dintlha tse di botlhokwa tsa dikadimo tsa dimasepala..   Khalentara ya go Phasalatsa Pele ga Nako Dipalopalo tsa Bosenyi tse di Rekotilweng tsa Kotara Nngwe le Nngwe mo Ngwageng wa Ditšhelete wa 2022/.
tgt_text: It will work towards the South African creative industry being able to access the local and international markets..

src_text: Kabinete amogetse Khalentara ya go Phasalatsa Pele ga Nako Dipalopalo tsa Bosenyi tse di Rekotilweng tsa Kotara Nngwe le Nngwe mo Ngwageng wa Ditšhelete wa 2022/.
tgt_text: Updated Policy Framework for Municipal Borrowing and Financial Emergencies.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse gore dipalopalo tsa bosenyi tsa kotara nngwe le nngwe di ka phasaladiwa.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the amendments to the current Policy Framework for Municipal Borrowing and Financial Emergencies.

src_text: Seno ke go fetola nako gore se tshwane le ya mo ngwageng o fetileng ya go phasalatsa dipalopalo tsa bosenyi tsa naga.
tgt_text: The amendments are mainly on the borrowing section of this framework.

src_text: Nako e tshitshintsweng ya go phasalatsa dipalopalo tsa bosenyi pele ga nako ke Phatwe 2022 malebana le kotara ya ntlha le Ngwanaitseele 2022 malebana le kotara ya bobedi.
tgt_text: Amongst the amendments   proposed introducing longer-term borrowing period to match the useful lifespan of some of the assets being financed.

src_text: Dipalopalo tsa bosenyi tsa kotara ya boraro le ya bone di tla phasaladiwa ka Tlhakole le Motsheganong 2023, ka tatelano ya tsona..   Go Khutlisa Seemo sa Bosetšhaba sa Matlhotlhapelo (NSoD).
tgt_text: The amendments also clarify the role of development finance institutions in the lending space of the municipalities.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse kgato ya go khutlisa Seemo sa Bosetšhaba sa Matlhotlhapelo (NSoD) jaaka ne ya tsenngwa tirisong morago ga merwalela e sentseng thata kwa Kapa Botlhaba le KwaZulu-Natal..   NSoD khutlile ka la bo 18 Phatwe 2022 go latela gore atolosediwe nako ka la bo 18 Phukwi.
tgt_text: Section 230 of the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of 1996 empowers municipalities to raise loans for their capital or current expenditure.

src_text: Go atolosediwa nako gono ne le ka ntlha ya fa go ne go santse go na le tlhokagalo ya gore go tswelele go tshegetsa dikgato tse di leng teng tsa go samagana le ditiragalo tse di diragaditsweng ke dikarolo tsa puso go fokotsa le go samagana le ditlamorago tsa ditiragalo tsa ditshenyegelo tse dikgolo ka ntlha ya maemo bosa kwa diporofenseng tse di amegileng..   Kabinete dumelane gore maemo ga jaana ga sa tlhole tlhoka gore go nne le dikgato tse di kgethegileng ka ntlha ya fa dikarolo tsa puso, lephata la poraefete le baagi ba tla kgona go netefatsa gore ba tsweletsa dikgato tsa go thusa, go busetsa sekeng le go aga sešwa   Melaotlhomo.
tgt_text: The original framework was approved by Cabinet in 2000 to guide Chapter 6 and 13 of the Municipal Finance Act, 2003 (Act 56 of 2003).

src_text: Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa go Kwadisa Makwalo Bodulo wa Ngwaga wa.
tgt_text: The approved amendments seek to incentivise more lenders in the municipality markets but continue to maintain the core principles underlying municipal borrowing..  Pre-release calendar for the publication of the quarterly recorded crime statistics for 2022/23 financial year.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse gore Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa go Kwadisa Makwalo Bodulo wa ngwaga wa 2020 ka romelwa kwa Palamenteng gore ye go sekasekiwa ka tsenelelo.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the proposed pre-release calendar for the publication of the quarterly crime statistics for the 2022/23 financial year.

src_text: Kabinete ka Seetebosigo 2020 ne ya letlelela gore molaotlhomo ono ka romelwa lekgetlo le lengwe gape kwa baaging gore ba ntshe maikutlo bona ka ga ona.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the quarterly crime stats release.

src_text: Dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa di tla dira gore ditshwanelo tsa go nna le lefatshe nne selo sa boammaruri se se sireleditsweng semolao ke Karolo ya bo 25(6) ya Molaotheo wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa wa.
tgt_text: This was to change the previous annual release of the crime stats for the country.

src_text: Molaotlhomo ono dira gore jaanong go kokoanngwa ga dipalopalo malebana le lotso, bosetšhaba le boagi jwa batshodi ba ditshwanelo tsa lefatshe mo Aforika Borwa nne selo se se kgonagalang.
tgt_text: The proposed pre-release calendar crime statistics is August 2022 for quarter one and November 2022 for quarter two.

src_text: Kgaolo eno tla dira gore mo isagong go nne bonolo go kwala dipegelo tse di nepagetseng tsa boruni jwa lefatshe le tsa tshekatsheko ya lefatshe fa re lekola diphetogo mo go nneng beng ba lefatshe.. tgt_text: Crime statistics for quarter three and quarter four will be released in February and May 2023 respectively..  Lapse of the National State of Disaster (NSoD).

src_text: Kabinete amogetse gore Molaotlhomo wa NWRIA wa 2022 ka phasaladiwa sebaka sa malatsi le 90 gore setšhaba se ntshe maikutlo sona ka ga ona.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the lapse of the National State of Disaster (NSoD) that was declared following the devastating floods in the Eastern Cape and KwaZulu-Natal..

src_text: Molaotlhomo ono tshitshinya gore go tlhomiwe setheo sa NWRIA se se tla rwalang maikarabelo go rulaganya, go tlamela ka ditšhelete le go tlhabolola mafaratlhatlha metsi mo nageng.
tgt_text: The NSoD lapsed on 18 August 2022 following its extension on 18 July.

src_text: Gape se tla bo se na le maikarabelo go tlhokomela mafaratlhatlha a leng teng metsi.
tgt_text: The extension considered the need to continue augmenting the existing contingency measures undertaken by organs of state to mitigate and address the impact of severe weather in the affected provinces..

src_text: Setheo seno se tla tshwanela ke go netefatsa gore go nna le tlamelo e sa kgaotseng ya metsi e rebolang metsi ka go lekalekana le e go tsamaisana le maitlamo molaotheo gore batho ba tshwanetswe go tlamelwa ka metsi le tikologo e babalesegileng mme itekanetse.
tgt_text: Cabinet agreed that current circumstances no longer warrant the extraordinary measures as organs of state, the private sector and civil society will continue to ensure ongoing relief, recovery and reconstruction  Bills.

src_text: Setheo seno se tla tlhomiwa go nna Setheo sa Puso ka fa tlase ga Šejule 2 ya Molao wa Ditšhelete tsa Puso, wa ngwaga wa 1999 (Molao wa bo 1 wa 1999).

src_text: Molaotlhomo ono baakanya Molao wa Dithata le Ditiro tsa Ditšhelete tsa Dimasepala, wa ngwaga wa 2007 (Molao wa bo 12 wa 2007)..     Dikarolo tseno tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa di laola maatla dimasepala go lefisa ditefiso tsa tlhabololo malebana le dikopo tsa tlhabololo ya lefatshe tse di neelwang dimasepala.
tgt_text: The proposed amendments will give effect to the realisation of the land tenure that is legally secured in Section 25(6) of the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of.

src_text: Dikarolo tseno di tla netefatsa gore dimasepala di dirisa ditefiso tseno kwa ntle ga go tsaya letlhakore, kwa ntle ga bofitlha le ka tshwanelo.
tgt_text: The Bill provides for the collection of the statistics in terms of race, gender, nationality and citizenship of the holders of land rights in South Africa.

tgt_text: Cabinet approved the publishing of the NWRIA Bill of 2022 for public comment for period of ninety (90) days.

src_text: Molaotlhomo ono tshitshinya gore Melao le supa kwalolwe sešwa leng (1) Molao wa Letlole la Diphenšene la Ditheo tse di Dirang Tiro ya Mothale oo, wa ngwaga wa 1963 (Molao wa bo 41, wa 1963); (2) Molao wa Diphenšene tsa Masole, wa ngwaga wa 1976 (Molao wa bo 84 wa 1976); (3) Molao wa Diphenšene tsa Badiri ba Puso wa ngwaga wa 1996; (4) Molao wa Khomišene ya Ditšhelete le Taolo ya Matlole, wa ngwaga wa 1997 (Molao wa bo 99 wa 1996); (5) Molao wa Banka ya Lefatshe le Tlhabololo ya Temothuo, wa ngwaga wa 2002 (Molao wa bo 15 wa 2002); (6) Molao wa Porofešene ya Boruni wa ngwaga wa 2005 (Molao wa bo 26 wa 2005) le (7) Molao o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Porofešene ya Boruni wa ngwaga wa 2021, (Molao wa bo 5 wa 2021).
tgt_text: The Bill proposes the setting up of an NWRIA to be responsible for the planning, financing and development of the water infrastructure for the country.

src_text: Dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa di akaretsa tse di leng ka fa tlase ga Molao wa Diphenšene tsa Masole wa 1996, tse di ka ga go akarediwa mo diphenšeneng tsa masole balekane ba masole gore le bona ba natholelwe ditshiamelo tsa bona mme go tla tsewa gore seno se tla diragadiwa go tloga ka letlha la bo 27 Moranang.
tgt_text: It will also be responsible for the maintenance of the current water infrastructure.

src_text: Dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa tsa melao ya diphenšene di tla dira gore ka gangwe balekane ba masole ba natholelwe merokotso ya diphenšene fa ba tswa mo kgolaganong ya lenyalo.
tgt_text: The agency is to ensure sustainable, equitable and reliable supply of water in line with constitutional obligations of access to water and secure healthy environment.

src_text: Mo godimo ga go sedifatsa seabe sa Tona ya Ditšhelete mo boruning, ntlha nngwe e kwalolotsweng sešwa ke e mabapi le go oketsa dithata tsa komiti ya kgalemo ya baruni fa moruni amogetse molato.
tgt_text: The agency will be set up as Public Entity under the Schedule 2 of the Public Finance Management Act, 1999 (Act 1 of 1999).

src_text: Molaotlhomo ono phasaladitswe ka Ferikgong 2022 gore baagi ba ntshe maikutlo bona ka ga ona..   Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Melao Yotlhe e Lwantshanang le goTlhatswiwa ga Tšhelete le go Lwantsha Tlamelo ya Ditšhelete tsa Menolopuso) wa Ngwaga wa.

tgt_text: The Bill amends the Municipal Fiscal Powers and Functions Act, 2007 (Act 12 of 2007).

src_text: Dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa tseno di tsibogela makoa a nopotsweng ke dinaga tsa balekane mo Letsholong la Setlhopha sa Ditiro tsa go Tsaya Dikgato mo Mererong ya Ditšhelete (FATF).

src_text: Pegelo eno dirile ditshitshinyo di le 40 tse di tla thusang go dira gore Aforika Borwa tsamaisane le dikgato tsa boditšhabatšhaba tsa go lwantshana le go tlhatswiwa ga tšhelete le go tlamela ka ditšhelete mekgatlo ya menolopuso.. tgt_text: Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the Financial Matters Amendments Bill,.

The Bill proposes the amendment to seven Acts, namely (1) Associated Institutions Pension Fund Act, 1963 (Act 41 of 1963); (2) Military Pension Act,1976 (Act 84 of 1976); (3) Government Employees Pension Law of 1996; (4) Financial and Fiscal Commission Act,1997 (Act 99 of 1997); (5) Land and Agricultural Development Bank Act, 2002 (Act 15 of 2002); (6) Audit Profession Act 2005 (Act 26 of 2005) and  the (7) Auditing Profession Amendment Act 2021 (Act 5 of 2021).

src_text: Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Diritibatsi le go Gweba ka Diritibatsi wa Ngwaga wa.
tgt_text: The proposed amendments include, under the Military Pension Act of 1996, the inclusion of life partners to the benefits retrospectively from 27 April.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse gore Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Diritibatsi le go Gweba ka Diritibatsi wa Ngwaga wa 2022 ka isiwa kwa Palamente go sekasekiwa ka tsenelelo.. Molao wa Diritibatsi le go Gweba ka Diritibatsi, wa ngwaga wa 1992 (Molao wa bo 140 wa 1992) dira gore go tlhagisa le go tlamela ka sere sepe se se akareditsweng ka fa tlase ga Šejule 1 le Šejule 2 ya Molao ono go tsewe le tlolo ya molao.. tgt_text: The pension laws amendments will enable spouses to realise their pension interest immediately on dissolution of the marriage.

src_text: Ka ngwaga wa 2020, Kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo rebotse katlholo ya gore Karolo ya bo 63 ya Molao wa Diritibatsi le go Gweba ka Diritibatsi wa 1992 ga tsamaisane le molaotheo mme ne ya beela thoko go tsenngwa tirisong ga katlholo eno go fitlha ka la bo 17 Sedimonthole 2022 go naya Palamente nako gore baakanye phoso eno   Tiragalo e Tlang.
tgt_text: In addition to clarifying the role of the Minister of Finance and on the auditing, the amendments also adjust the powers of the enforcement committee where an auditor admits guilt.

tgt_text: The Bill is an omnibus Bill that amends the current Acts namely  Financial Intelligence Centre Act, 2001 (Act 38 of 2001); (ii) Nonprofit Organisation Act, 1997 (Act 71 of 1997); (iii) Trust Property Control Act, 1988 (Act 57 of 1988); (iv) Companies Act, 2008 (Act 71 of 2008) and  Financial Sector Regulations Act, 2017( Act 9 of 2017).

src_text: Re le mmuso o tlhokomelang baagi ba yona, re santse re eme ka le le reng re tla tshwarisana tiro le badirisanimmogo mo mererong ya go tlhokomela baagi gore motho yo mongwe le yo mongwe isago ya gagwe nne botoka.

src_text: Kabinete kgalema ka mafoko a bogale baagi ba kwa Tongaat kwa KwaZulu-Natal ka go senya mafaratlhatlha tikologo eo fa ba ne ba rebotse megwanto ya go lwela metsi.

src_text: Kabinete ikuetse gore baagi ba theose matshwafo le go nna le pelotelele jaaka ba Setheo sa Ditiro tsa go Tlhatswa Metsi sa Tongaat ba samagane le ditiro tsa go busetsa baagi metsi.
tgt_text: Iziseko zophuhliso zoluntu.

tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikugxekile ukutshatyalaliswa kweziseko zophuhliso ngabahlali base-Tongaat KwaZulu-Natal ngexesha loqhankqalazo befuna amanzi.

src_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke go saeniwa ke Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa ga Molao o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Ditheo tsa Dimasepala mo Dipusoselegaeng wa Ngwaga wa 2022 (Molao wa bo 3 wa 2022) gore nne molao.
tgt_text: Nangona kunjalo, ubundlobongela kunye neziphithiphithi azisosisombululo, kwaye ukutshatyalaliswa kweziseko zophuhliso kulimaza kuphela uluntu.

src_text: Maitlhomo molao ono ke go tlhabolola dithata le maemo maitshwaro dipusoselegae.
tgt_text: UMthetho oLungisiweyo kwiiNkqubo zikaMasipala kuRhulumente wamaKhaya wama-.

src_text: Molao ono ke karolo ya dikgato tse di tsewang ke puso tsa go dira gore ditirelo tsa puso nne tse di manontlhotlho le go dira bonnete jwa gore batho ba tlamelwa ka ditirelo tse di sa kgaotseng, fela jaaka go tlhalositswe mo ditshwanelong tse di botlhokwa tse di umakilweng mo Molaotheong wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa wa..  Molao ono totobatsa dikgato tse di tshwanetsweng go latelwa go thapa batlhankedi ba bagolwane mo pusong.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iwamkele uMthetho oYilwayo weeNkqubo zooMasipala kuRhulumente wamaKhaya, wama-2022 (uMthetho 3 wama-2022) otyikityiweyo nguMongameli Cyril Ramaphosa.

src_text: Jaanong molao ono ganetsa batlhankedi ba ba golwane mo pusong go ka tshwara ditiro tse dingwe tsa sepolotiki mo mekgatlhong ya dipolotiki.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho ujolise ekuphuculeni amandla kunye nemigangatho yeendlela zokuziphatha zikarhulumente wamakhaya.

src_text: Se sengwe gape ka molao ono ke gore re diphatlhatiro tsa batsamaisi ba dimasepala tse di iseng di thapelwe batlhankedi mo go tsona di tshwanetse go phasaladiwa naga ka bophara gore botlhe ba ba nang le matshwanedi ba tsenye dikopo tsa go neelwa ditiro tseo.
tgt_text: Lo mthetho uyinxalenye yamalinge karhulumente okwenza iNkonzo kaRhulumente yenziwe ngobuchule kwaye iqinisekise ukubonelela ngeenkonzo okuzinzileyo ebantwini, njengelungelo elisisiseko eliqulathwe kuMgaqo-siseko weRiphablikhi yoMzantsi Afrika we-..

src_text: Kabinete na le tshepo e tletseng ya gore dikarolo tseno tse di fetotsweng di tla dira bonnete jwa gore batho bao ba thapilweng kgotsa bao ba tlhophilweng mo maemong bona ba tla kgona go dira seo ba se thapetsweng go ya ka seo ba se solofeditseng gore re kgone go dira gore botshelo bo nne botoka mo bathong botlhe.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uchaza iinkqubo emazilandelwe xa kuqeshwa kwizikhundla eziphezulu.

src_text: Bosenyi.
tgt_text: Ngoku uthintela amagosa aphezulu karhulumente ekubeni abe nezikhundla zopolitiko kumaqela ezopolitiko.

src_text: Kabinete rolela hutshe batlhankedi ba tlhatlhobo ya dithoto kwa melelwaneng ba Setheo sa Tirelo ya Lekgetho la Aforika Borwa (SARS) jaaka kwa Boemelafofaneng ba OR Tambo ka Latshipi wa la bo 28 Phatwe 2022 ba tshwere dithoto tse di neng di tlisiwa kwano tsa boima jwa dikilokerema di le 785 tsa diokobatsi tsa crystal meth tse boleng jwa tsona bo ka dirang R236 milione fa di rekisiwa mo mebileng.
tgt_text: Kananjalo kulo Mthetho ukhoyo, izithuba zoomanejala boomasipala ezingenabantu kulindeleke ukuba zipapashwe kuzwelonke ukutsala iqela elibanzi labagqatswa abafanelekileyo.

src_text: Go tshwariwa ga diokobatsi tseno go tla romela ditlhokotsebe tsa digongwana tsa diokobatsi molaetsa o totobetseng wa gore melelwane ya rona tlhokometswe ka botlalo bile batlhankedi ba naga ya rona ba dira ka natla go fedisa botlhokotsebe  Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iqinisekile ukuba olu tshintsho luza kuqinisekisa ukuba abo banyuliweyo okanye abanyulwe kwezi zikhundla baya kukwazi ukuphumeza izithembiso zabo ukuze wonke umntu azuze ubomi obungcono.

src_text: Pegelo ya Lekgotla le le Samaganang le Merero ya Setheo sa Thuto Kgolwane ka ga Dipatlisiso tsa Megolo ya Batlatsabakhanselara le ya Batlhankedi ba Bagolo mo Ditheong tsa Aforika Borwa tsa Thuto Kgolwane.
tgt_text: Ulwaphulo-mthetho.

src_text: Kabinete tsopoletswe ka seo se setseng se dirilwe mo dipatlisisong tsa CHE tse mo ngwageng wa 2020 Tona ya Thuto Kgolwane, Saense le Boitshimololedi, Ngaka Blade Nzimande laetseng gore di diriwe, gore go sekasekiwe megolo le go thapiwa ga khuduthamaga ya diyunibesiti mo sebakeng se se fetileng sa dingwaga di le 15, go simolola ka ngwaga wa 2005 go fitlha ka ngwaga wa..  Maitlhomo dipatlisiso tseno ke go tlhatlhoba gore diyunibesiti kgotsa ditheo tsa thuto kgolwane tsa ka fa nageng ya rona ke eng se se di dirang gore di kgone go itshomarela, di kgone go dira tiro ya tsona le gore di kgone go itlhabolola.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi income amagosa eNkonzo yeRhafu yoMzantsi Afrika ngokuthimba i-785 kg ye-crystal meth enexabiso lasesitratweni lezigidi ezingama-R236 kwisikhululo seenqwelomoya i-OR Tambo International ngeCawe, umhla wama-28 kweyeThupha wama-.

src_text: Pegelo eno nopotse dintlha tse di botlhokwa tse di utulotseng mmogo le go dira ditshwaelo tsa gore ke eng se se ka diriwang go okobatsa maemo.
tgt_text: Ukubhaqwa kweziyobisi kuya kuthumela isilumkiso esicacileyo kumaqela abophuli-mthetho ukuba amazibuko ethu okungena kunye nawokuphuma akhuselwe kakuhle kwaye amagosa ethu asebenza nzima ukuphelisa naluphi na ulwaphulo-mthetho     Izigqibo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Gare ga tse dingwe tse dintsi, ditshwaelo tse di tshwaetsweng di tshitshinya gore megolo ya batlhankedi tshwanetse go tlhoka lehunelo.
tgt_text: Ingxelo yeBhunga leMfundo ePhakamileyo (i-CHE) ngoMvuzo weeSekela-Tshansela zeeYunivesithi kunye naBaphathi abaPhezulu abaLawulayo eMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Go tshwanetswe go tlhomiwe setheo se se ikemetseng se se sa direleng lephata leno gore nne sona se se rwalang maikarabelo go tsaya ditshweetso tse di tsamaisanang le megolo tshitshinya gape le gore dithulaganyo tsa go tlhatlhoba fa batlhankedi ba dira tiro ka botswapelo di tshwanetse go gagamadiwa mo ditheong tseno.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi inikwe amagqabantshintshi ngeziphumo zophando lwe-CHE olwagunyaziswa ngowama-2020 nguMphathiswa wezeMfundo ePhakamileyo, ezeNzululwazi kunye noKusungulwa Kwezinto Ezintsha, uGq Blade Nzimande, ukuze kuphononongwe amanqanaba emivuzo kunye neendlela zabaphathi beeyunivesithi kwisithuba seminyaka eli-15 ukusuka ngowama-2005 ukuya kutsho kowama-..     Uphando ibikukumisela uzinzo, ukusebenza kunye nophuhliso lweeyunivesithi okanye icandelo lemfundo ephakamileyo kweli lizwe.

src_text: Dipatlisiso tseno tse di dirilweng di lebeletse gape le bogolo jo bo farologaneng jwa ditheo tseno mmogo le go tlhoma boleng jwa maemo a tsamaisanang le ditheo tsa dinaga tsa boditšhabatšhaba.
tgt_text: Le ngxelo ichaza iziphumo eziphambili kunye nezindululo zokulungisa.

src_text: Go solofetswe gore Tona ya Thuto Kgolwane, Saense le Boitshimololedi tla atlhaatlha pegelo eno le khuduthamaga ya diyunibesiti maitlhomo le go gagamatsa ditheo tseno tsa thuto tla re morago ga foo, pegelo eno ya phasaladiwa mo webesaeteng ya Lefapha la Ditheo tse Dikgolwane tsa Thuto le Katiso: mo go www.dhet.gov.za.
tgt_text: Izindululo ziphakamisa, phakathi kwezinye izinto, inkqubo yomvuzo eqinisiweyo kunye nephandle.

src_text: Go Fetola Batsholateu mo Batlhankeding ba Lephata la Thuto le Dipatlisiso mo Lekaleng la Thuto Kgolwane.
tgt_text: Ukusekwa kwesigqeba sokujonga sangaphandle kwaye nesizimeleyo ukojonga inkqubo yokwenziwa kwezigqibo zemivuzo.

src_text: Kabinete eme nokeng ditshitshinyo tsa dipatlisiso ka bobedi tse di dirilweng ka maitlhomo go re tlhaba botlhale ka dikgato tse re tshwanetseng go di tsaya go oketsa lebelo la go fetola batsholateu mo batlhankeding ba lephata la thuto le dipatlisiso mo lekaleng la thuto kgolwane.
tgt_text: Zikwaphakamisa nokuqiniswa kweenkqubo zovavanyo lomsebenzi kumaziko.

src_text: Pegelo ya ntlha ke e dirilweng ke Setlhophatiro sa Ditona seo se dirileng dipatlisiso mabapi le gore go gana kae gore go thapiwe, go somarelwe le gore go godisiwe batlhankedi ba thuto kgolwane ba bathobantsho ba leng maAforika Borwa.
tgt_text: Uphononongo lukwathathele ingqalelo ubungakanani bala maziko kwaye lwenza nokulinganisa lujonga kumazwe ngamazwe.

src_text: Pegelo ya bobedi ke e dirilweng ke Lefapha la Saense le Boitshimololedi mmogo le Setheo sa Dipatlisiso sa Naga – mo ba dirileng dipatlisiso tseno le Diyunibesiti tsa Naga ya Aforika Borwa leng lekoko la diyunibesiti tsa puso di le 26 tsa naga.
tgt_text: UMphathiswa weMfundo ePhakamileyo, iNzululwazi noKusungulwa Kwezinto Ezintsha kulindeleke ukuba axoxe ngale ngxelo neenkokeli zeyunivesithi njengenyathelo lokomeleza la maziko emfundo.

src_text: Dipegelo tseno ka bobedi di tshitshinya gore go nne le maano go samagana le morero wa go fetola batsholateu mo dikarolong di le tlhano tse dikgolo leng karolo e mabapi le go tlhagisa batlhankedi ba maemo thuto ya morago ga go konosetsa dithuto tsa ntlha tse dikgolwane; karolo ya bobedi ke ya go nna le seabe ga badiredi ba setheo; karolo ya boraro ke ya setlwaedi sa go dira dilo mo setheong sa thuto se se amegang le ka fao se dirang tiro ka gone; karolo ya bone ke ya mabapi le dipholisi le maano mmogo le karolo ya botlhano e leng ka ga go samagana le ditiragalo tsa go tlhaela ga didirisiwa.
tgt_text: Ingxelo iya kuthi emva koko ipapashwe kwiwebhusayithi yeSebe leMfundo ePhakamileyo noQeqesho: www.dhet.gov.za..     INguqu eKhawulezayo yoPhando kunye neSakhono sokuFundisa kwiCandelo leMfundo ePhakamileyo.

src_text: Tumelano le Dinaga tsa Boditšhabatšhaba Mabapi le Didirisiwa tsa Tshimologo ya Dijalo go Thusa mo Mererong ya Dijo le ya Temo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi izixhasile izindululo zamaphononongo amabini awayegunyaziswe ukuba acebise ngamanyathelo aza kuthathwa ukuze kukhawuleziswe inguqu yophando kunye nesakhono sokufundisa kumaziko emfundo ephakamileyo.

src_text: Kabinete isitse tumelano eno kwa Palamenteng gore amogelwe.
tgt_text: Ingxelo yokuqala yenziwe liQela laBaphathiswa eliSebenzayo elaphanda ngemiqobo ethintela ukuqeshwa, ukugcinwa kunye nokuqhubela phambili kwezifundiswa ezimnyama zaseMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Seno se tla dira gore Aforika Borwa nne nngwe ya dinaga tse di dumelaneng ka tumelano eno e kaelang dinaga tse leng karolo ya tumelano eno go somarela le go tlhokomela didirisiwa tsa tshimologo ya dijalo go thusa mo mererong ya dijo le ya temothuo.
tgt_text: Ingxelo yesibini – egunyaziswe liSebe lezeNzululwazi noKusungulwa Kwezinto Ezintsha kunye neSiseko soPhando lweSizwe – yenziwe yi-Universities South Africa, iqumrhu elimele iiyunivesithi zoluntu ezingama-26 kweli lizwe.

src_text: Ka go ikobela tumelano eno, seo se tla thusa go gagamatsa maikemisetso naga eno ago somarela le go tlhokomela ka fao didirisiwa tsa go simolola dijalo diriwang ka teng, mmogo le go ema nokeng baagi ba kwa metseselegaeng.
tgt_text: Zombini ezi ngxelo zinikeze ngamacebo ongenelelo ukuze kukhawuleziswe inguqu kwimimandla emihlanu ebanzi, esebefumene isidanga sokuqala; ukuthatha inxaxheba kwabasebenzi; inkcubeko kunye nokusebenza kweziko; umgaqo-nkqubo nesicwangciso, kunye nezibonelelo ezingqongopheleyo..     ISivumelwano saMazwe ngaMazwe ngeMithombo Yemfuza yeZityalo zoKutya kunye nezoLimo (iSivumelwano).

src_text: Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro ya go Fetola Aforika Borwa ka Tsela e Kgotsofalelwang ke Botlhe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukungeniswa kweSivumelwano ePalamente.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go tsenya tirisong Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro ya go Fetola Aforika Borwa ka Tsela e Kgotsofalelwang ke Botlhe.
tgt_text: Oku kuya kwenza ukuba uMzantsi Afrika ube yinxalenye yamaqela esi Sivumelwano, nesikhokela amazwe angamalungu ekulondolozeni kunye nasekuqinisekiseni usetyenziso oluzinzileyo lwemithombo yemfuza yezityalo ekutyeni nakwezolimo.

src_text: Leano leno le na le ponelopele botlhe ba nang le yona e ka ga go nna le Aforika Borwa yo botlhe ba lekalekanang mo go yona gape sa kgotlheleng tikologo tlhalosa ditheo le dipholisi tseo di tla re thusang gore re kgone go diragatsa seo.
tgt_text: Ukungena kwesi siVumelwano kuya komeleza ukuzibophelela kwelizwe ngokubhekiselele kulondolozo kunye nokusetyenziswa ngokuzinzileyo kwemithombo yemfuza yezityalo, kwaye sinike inkxaso kuluntu lwasemaphandleni.

src_text: Leano leno le tla ama motho mang le mang yo leng ka fa gare ga naga ya Aforika Borwa bile tla re naya tšhono ya gore re kgone go baakanya lefa leo puso ya tlhaolele re sietseng lona leng la go dira gore batho ba se lekalekane mme re dire gore re nna le ikonomi botlhe mo go yona ba unngwelwang.
tgt_text: ISicwangciso-nkqubo seNguqu eluLungileyo soMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Khomišene ya Moporesitente e Samaganang le Merero ya Phetogo ya Maemo Loapi dirile dikgato di le dintsi tsa go batlana le maikutlo badirisanimmogo mo mererong ya loago mme bontsi jwa bona bo ne ba ema nokeng leano leno.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivume iSicwangciso-nkqubo seNguqu eluLungileyo ukuba iphunyezwe.

src_text: Kabinete totobaditse gore kgato ya go fetola maemo go dira gore re ngwaga wa 2050 goroga fitlhele re se tlhole re dirisa dilwana tse di kueletsang mesi tshwanetse go tsamaelana le dilo tse re fisegelang go di bona mo tlhabololong ya naga, mme di tsenyeletsa le tsa go tlhola ditiro tse di nang le seriti mo bathong botlhe, go thusa baagi le go fedisa tshokolo.
tgt_text: Esi sicwangciso-nkqubo sibonisa umbono okwabelwana ngawo woMzantsi Afrika olinganayo, nokwaziyo ukumelana nemozulu.

src_text: Kabinete ikuetse mo go badirisanimmogo botlhe mo mererong ya loago go ema nokeng leano leno la go tsamaisa tiro.
tgt_text: Sichaza imigaqo kunye neendawo kumgaqo-nkqubo zokuphumeza oku.

src_text: Leano le le tseneletseng la go tsamaisa tiro le tla tle le kwalwa, mme le tla golaganngwa le maano puso mmogo le go golaganngwa gape le thulaganyetso ya go dirisa matlole.
tgt_text: Isicwangciso-nkqubo senguqu siza kuchaphazela wonke umntu waseMzantsi Afrika, sinike ithuba lokulungisa ukungalingani okwenziwa yimbali kwaye sidale uqoqosho oluxhamlisa wonke umntu.

src_text: Karata Ntšhwa ya Laesense ya go Kganna ka fa Nageng ya Aforika Borwa.
tgt_text: IKomishoni kaMongameli yeMozulu iqhube inkqubo yothethathethwano ebanzi kunye namahlakani ezentlalo yaze yafumana inkxaso ebanzi ngesi sicwangciso-nkqubo.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa gore Karata ya Laesense ya go Kganna e ntseng dirisiwa tseelwe legato ke karata eo nang le dintlha di le dintsinyana tse di ka ga go thibela tirisobotlhaswa ya yona.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iqinisekisile ukuba inguqu eya kuqoqosho olungenayo ikhabhoni ngowama-2050 kufuneka ixhase iminqweno yophuhliso lwesizwe, kuqukwe imisebenzi endilisekileyo kumntu wonke, ubandakanyo lwentlalo kunye nokupheliswa kwentlupheko.

src_text: Karata e dirisiwang ga jaanong simolotse go dirisiwa bogolotala go simolola ka ngwaga wa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ihlabe ikhwelo kuwo onke amahlakani ezentlalo ukuba axhase aze amkele esi sicwangciso-nkqubo.

src_text: Diphetogo mo thekenolojing di ntse di nna teng mme jaanong re setse re dirisa madi a boitshegang gore re kgone go tlhokomela dikarata tseno.
tgt_text: Isicwangciso esineenkcukacha zokuphumeza esi sicwangciso-nkqubo siya kuphuhliswa, kwaye sidityaniswe kwinkqubo yocwangciso kunye neyohlahlo lwabiwo-mali karhulumente.

src_text: Karata ga jaana tshitshintsweng tla dira gore dilaesense tsa go kganna tsa naga eno di tsamaisane le Dilaesense tsa go Kganna tse di Dirisiwang ke Dinaga tsa Boditšhabatšhaba ka Thekenoloji ya Tshedimosetso ya Dintlha tsa Boitshupo (ISO18013).
tgt_text: Ikhadi elitsha leLayisenisi yokuQhuba yoMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Pholisi ya Letsholo la Ditiro tsa Sešhaba mo Metseng (EPWP).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivume ukutshintshwa kweKhadi leLayisensi yokuQhuba elikhoyo ngoku lize lifakwe kwelinye elineempawu ezikhuselekileyo.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go phasalatsa sekwalwa se iseng se butswe sa pholisi ya EPWP ka maitlhomo go naya setšhaba tšhono ya gore se ntshe maikutlo sona ka ga sekwalwa seno.
tgt_text: Le nkqubo yangoku oko yayisebenza ukusukela ngo-.

src_text: EPWP ke le lengwe la matsholo a botlhokwa puso maitlhomo lona leng go fedisa tshokolo le go neela baagi megolo ya tiro ba dirileng mo metseng ka go ba naya ditiro tsa nakwana, segolobogolo ka go naya bašwa le basadi ditiro.
tgt_text: Ubuchwephesha ukusukela ngoko sebatshintsha kwaye kuya kuxabisa kakhulu ukugcina iziseko zophuhliso ezikhoyo .

src_text: Sekwalwa se sentšhwa se iseng se butswe sa pholisi se tla matlafatsa letsholo leno mmogo le go abelana ka tshedimosetso e tlhamaletseng e ka ga megolo, dithulaganyo tse di tla diriwang go kopa thuso ya matlole mmogo le go thusa baagi, mmogo le go dira gore EPWP tsamaisane le dithulaganyo tse di leng teng tsa matsatsi ano tsa go tlhokomela badiri.
tgt_text: Ikhadi elitsha elicetywayo liya kwenza ilayisenisi yokuqhuba yeli lizwe ihambelane ne-International Information Technology Personal Identification Compliant Driving License (i-ISO18013).

src_text: Se tla dira gore tirisanommogo magareng ga makala puso le makala poraefete gagamale go dira gore EPWP nne le mosola mogolo thata mo go direng gore tlhole ditiro tse di seriti le mo go fediseng tshokolo.
tgt_text: UMgaqo-nkqubo weNkqubo eYandisiweyo yeMisebenzi kaRhulumente (i-EPWP).

src_text: Se sengwe gape se pholisi eno tla se dirang ke go rotloetsa gore matsholo go direla setšhaba se latele thulaganyo le nngwe e tshwanang gotlhe mo nageng mme kgone go nna le boitshimololedi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukupapashwa kwiphephandaba likarhulumente loMgaqo-nkqubo oyilwayo we-EPWP ukuze uluntu lubonisane ngawo.

src_text: Diphetogo mo Mofuteng wa Bone wa Madi Mantšhwa Tshipi Naga ya Aforika Borwa.
tgt_text: I-EPWP yenye yeenkqubo eziphambili zikarhulumente ezijolise ekuboneleleni ukuthomalalisa intlupheko kunye nokuzisa ingeniso ngokudala amathuba emisebenzi ethutyana, ingakumbi kulutsha kunye nabasetyhini.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula bogolo jwa mobentlo montšhwa le dikarolo tse dintšhwa tse di tla tsenngwang mo mading tshipi ngwaga wa 2023 mabapi le Diphetogo mo Mofuteng wa Bone wa Madi Mantšhwa Tshipi Naga ya Aforika Borwa.
tgt_text: Uyilo lomgaqo-nkqubo omtsha luza komeleza le nkqubo kwaye lunike ingcaciso kwimiba efana nemivuzo, imodeli yenkxaso-mali kunye nokhuseleko loluntu, kwaye lulungelelanise i-EPWP neendlela zokusebenza zale mihla.

src_text: Kabinete dumelane le gore ngwaga yo mongwe le yo mongwe dipuo tse di dirisitsweng mo mading a tla dirisiwang tshipi di tshwanetse go fetolwa gore di neelane tšhono.
tgt_text: Luza kukhuthaza intsebenziswano phakathi kukarhulumente kunye necandelo labucala ukuqinisekisa ukuba i-EPWP inegalelo elikhulu ekudalweni kwemisebenzi endilisekileyo kunye nokuphelisa intlupheko.

src_text: Lefoko "Aforika Borwa" le tla tsenngwa fela mo letlhakoreng le le lengwe la madi ano tshipi mme le tla kwadiwa ka dipuo tsotlhe tsa naga eno.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo uza kukhuthaza ukusungulwa kwezinto ezintsha ekuphunyezweni kweenkqubo zemisebenzi yoluntu kwilizwe liphela.

src_text: Mo mading tshipi R5 go tla dirisiwa dipuo di le tharo; mo mading tshipi R2 50c 20c le 10c go tla dirisiwa dipuo di le pedi mme mo mading tshipi R1 go tla dirisiwa puo le nngwe.
tgt_text: Izilungiso kuLuhlu lweSine kwiMali eziNkozo zaseMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Dipuo tsotlhe tseno di tla neelana tšhono ngwaga mongwe le mongwe sebaka sa dingwaga tse di tlang di le.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iwamkele umyinge, uyilo kunye noqulunqo lonyaka wama-2023 lweSine kwiMali eziNkozo zoMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Sekwalwa se Iseng se Butswe se se ka ga Pholisi ya Ngwaga wa 2022 ya go Golaganya Ditirelo tsa Tlhokomelo ya Boleng jwa Metsi (IWQM).
tgt_text: Ivume inkqubo ejikelezayo qho ngonyaka yokusetyenziswa kweelwimi ezisemthethweni kuluhlu lwesine lweemali ezinkozo.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go phasalatsa mo kuranteng ya puso Sekwalwa se Iseng se Butswe sa Pholisi ya IWQM ka maitlhomo go naya setšhaba tšhono ya gore se ntshe maikutlo sona ka ga sekwalwa seno.
tgt_text: Igama elithi “uMzantsi Afrika” liya kufakwa kwelinye icala kwimali eyinkozo ze libhalwe ngazo zonke iilwimi ezisemthethweni.

src_text: Pholisi eno e tshitshintsweng tla tsena mo legatong la Pholisi e feletsweng ke nako ya WQM ya ngwaga wa 1991 mmogo le mo legatong la maano yona a neng tsenngwa tirisong ka ngwaga wa..  Pholisi eno tlhagisa dintlha di le tlhano tse di botlhokwa tse tla nnang tsona tse tlhokomelo ya boleng jwa metsi tla ikakatlelang ka tsona rulaganya ka tolamo melao yotlhe e tsamaisanang le merero ya metsi mmogo le maikano naga eno mo maitlhomong yona go obamela dithulaganyo tsa go somarela metsi jaaka le sedirisiwa se se tlhokagalang.
tgt_text: Iilwimi ezintathu ziya kusetyenziswa kwi-R5; iilwimi ezimbini kwi-R2; i-50c, i-20c, i-10c kunye ne-R1 ziya kuba ngolwimi olunye.

src_text: Sekwalwa se Iseng se Butswe sa Pholisi ya Makhubu Kgaso mo Nakong e Tlang.
tgt_text: Zonke ezi lwimi ziya kusetyenziswa ngendlela ejikeleziswayo rhoqo ngonyaka kule minyaka ili-10 izayo.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go phasalatsa Sekwalwa se Iseng se Butswe sa Pholisi ya Makhubu Kgaso mo Nakong e Tlang ka maitlhomo go naya setšhaba tšhono ya gore se ntshe maikutlo sona ka ga sekwalwa seno.
tgt_text: UMgaqo-nkqubo oYilwayo oDityanisiweyo woLawulo loMgangatho waManzi (i-IWQM) wowama-.

src_text: Makhubu ano ke mangwe metswedi ya tlhago mannye re nang le ona a leng botlhokwa thata mo go godiseng ikonomi ya Aforika Borwa mo mererong ya mafaratlhatlha setšhaba setegeniki le ditlhaeletsano.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukupapashwa kwiphephandaba likarhulumente koMgaqo-nkqubo oYilwayo we-IWQM ukuze uluntu lubonisane.

src_text: Pholisi e tshitshinngwang eno maitlhomo yona ke go ema nokeng dikgato tsa go abelana ka dilaesense tsa go disa marang kgaso mmogo le tsa megala; tsa go gasa dikanale; tsa go gasa marang ditlhaeletsano tsa difofane le tsa dikepe; tsa go dira dipatlisiso le tlhabologo; tsa go dirisiwa ke baagi le tsa diintaseteri tsa mothale oo.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo ucetywayo uya kuthatha indawo yoMgaqo-nkqubo we-WQM ophelelwe lixesha wama-1991 kunye nesicwangciso-qhinga sawo esamiselwa ngo-..

src_text: Maitlhomo mangwe pholisi eno ke go tlhotlheletsa tekatekano le go abelana marang ano ka go lekalekana gore mo lekaleng leno go nne le  phetogo ya batsholateu le go dira gore kgokaganyo ya marang setegeniki kgonege gore tshware le ko mafelong a kgakalakgakala le mafelo a tlhabologileng ka fa nageng ya rona.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo uchaza uluhlu lwemigaqo eya kuba sisiseko solawulo lomgangatho wamanzi.

src_text: Bathankedi ba Aforika Borwa ba ba Nopotsweng go ka Tshwanelwa ke go Tsenngwa mo Mokgatlhong wa Boditšhabatšhaba wa Mafaratlhatlha Ditlhaeletsano (ITU) le mo Botong ya Melawanataolo ya Marang Kgaso.
tgt_text: Uzobonelela ngolungelelwaniso kuyo yonke imithetho efanelekileyo enxulumene namanzi kunye nezibophelelo zelizwe ekuboneleleni nasekulondolozweni kwamanzi njengomthombo onqabileyo.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula leina la Rre Mandla Samuel Mchunu go nna mothankedi wa Aforika Borwa yo Nopotsweng go ka Tshwanelwa ke go Tsenngwa mo Mokgatlhong wa Boditšhabatšhaba wa Mafaratlhatlha Ditlhaeletsano (ITU) le mo Botong ya Melawanataolo ya Marang Kgaso (Kgaolo ya .
tgt_text: Uyilo loMgaqo-nkqubo weSizukulwana esiLandelayo seTeknoloji yezoNxibelelwano eSebenza ngaMaza oMoya.

src_text: Rre Mchunu ga jaanong dira jaaka tokololo mo botong eo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukupapashwa koyilo loMgaqo-nkqubo weSizukulwana esiLandelayo soMgaqo-nkqubo seTeknoloji yezoNxibelelwano eSebenza ngaMaza oMoya ukuze uluntu luhlomle.

src_text: Go tshitshinngwa gore tlhophiwe lekgetlo le lengwe gape mo Lekgotleng leno la ITU mo pakeng ya 2023 go fitlha mo pakeng ya..  Ditlhopho tseno di tla tshwarwa ka nako go tla bong go tshwerwe Khonferense ya Togomaano ya ITU e tla tshwarelwang kwa Bucharest, Romania go tloga ka la bo 26 Lwetse go fitlha ka la bo 14 Diphalane.
tgt_text: Iteknoloji yezonxibelelwano esebenza ngamaza omoya sisixhobo sendalo esibalulekileyo kuhlumo loqoqosho lwedijithali yoMzantsi Afrika kunye nakwisiseko sonxibelelwano.

src_text: Aforika Borwa santse eme ka maikemisetso yona go tshegetsa maitlhomo ITU go tswalela sekgala mo didirisiweng tsa setegeniki ka go dira gore lefatshe lotlhe le gokelelwe mafaratlhatlha ano  Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo ucetywayo ujonge ukuxhasa ulwabiwo lwamaza omoya kunye nokukhutshwa kweelayisenisi ezisisigxina zeselula; zosasazo; zenqwelomoya nezaselwandle; zophando nophuhliso; zokufikelela koluntu, kunye nezamanye amashishini afanelekileyo.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Ngwaoboswa.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo ukwajonge ukukhuthaza ulingano kunye nolwabiwo olungenamkhethe ukuze lwenze igalelo kwinguqu yeli candelo kunye nakufikeleleka kuqhagamshelwano lwedijithali nakwiindawo ezikude zelizwe.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Ngwaoboswa monongwaga ka kgwedi ya Lwetse tla ketikiwa ka morero yo reng : "Re bontsha Lefa la Solomon Linda mmogo le Mmino wa Setso wa Naga ya Aforika Borwa Tlotlo”.
tgt_text: Umgqatswa woMzantsi Afrika weManyano yoNxibelelwano lweZizwe ngeZizwe (i-ITU) kunye neBhodi yoLawulo kaNomathotholo .

src_text: Kabinete ikuela mo go maAforika Borwa otlhe go keteka Kgwedi ya Ngwaoboswa ka mokgwa wa go keteka ditso tsa rona tse di humileng tse di nang le maatla go dira gore re nne seoposengwe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi imamkele umgqatswa woMzantsi Afrika uMnu Mandla Samuel Mchunu kwiBhodi yeMimiselo kaNomathotholo (kwiNgingqi  ye-ITU.

src_text: Rotlhe re tshwanetse go tsaya matsapa gore re dirisane mmogo mo go fediseng ditiragalo tsa go re dira gore re se nne bana ba thari le nngwe mmogo le tsa go se tshware batho ka go tshwana tse re tswang ka tsona kwa loe mme re rotloetse maitsholo go ipela ga go nna maAforika Borwa a motlotlo  Melaetsa.
tgt_text: UMnu Mchunu ulilungu lebhodi esebenzayo ngoku.

src_text: Melaetsa ya go AkgolaKabinete romela melaetsa ya yona ya go akgola le go eletsa masego kwa go:Batho botlhe ba ba fentseng, ba ba ikgapetseng dimetale le bao ba neng ba gaisana le ba bangwe mo Lebelong la bo 95 la Comrades Marathon, leo le itsegeng ka la gore ke "Lebelo le le Gaisang Otlhe a Tshamekiwang ke Batho", leo le neng le tabogiwa ka Latshipi 28 Phatwe.
tgt_text: Kwaye kucetywa ukuba aphinde onyulwe kwiBhunga ye-ITU kwixesha lowama-2023 ukuya kowama-..     Unyulo luya kuqhubeka ngexesha leNkomfa yoNozakuzaku ye-ITU eya kubanjelwa e-Bucharest, e-Romania ukusuka ngomhla wama-26 kweyoMsintsi ukuya kowe-14 kweyeDwarha.

src_text: Mofenyi mo lebelong la banna ke Tete Dijana (mo tabogileng sebaka sa diura di le 5, metsotso le 30 le metsotswana le 38) yo nnang kwa Mahikeng kwa porofenseng ya Bokone Bophirima mme mo lebelong la bomme mofenyi ke Alexandra Morozova (mo tabogileng sebaka sa diura di le 6, metsotso le 17 le metsotswana le 47).
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika usazibophelele kwiinjongo ze-ITU zokuvala ukwahlukana kwedijithali kunye nokudibanisa bonke abantu behlabathi     Imisitho ezayo.

src_text: Melaetsa ya Matshediso Kabinete romela matshediso yone le kutlwelobotlhoko kwa go ba lelapa le ditsala tsa:Mama Rita Alice Ndzanga (yo neng na le dingwaga di le 88), yo neng le Segatlhamelamasisis mo mererong ya kgaratlhelo ya tokologo yo gape neng le mogale mo mokgatlhong wa badiri yo gape neilweng tlotla ka go abelwa Kabo ya Tlotlo ya Luthuli mo ngwageng wa 2004 “go tlotla seabe sa gagwe sa go lwela ditshwanelo tsa badiri botshelo jwa gagwe jotlhe mmogo le go lwela gore re feletse re na le Aforika Borwa yo sa tlhaoleng ba bangwe go ya ka morafe wa bona, go ya ka bong jwa bona, yo nang le tokologo le temokerasi”.Mapodisi le tlhano Tirelo ya Sepodisi sa Aforika Borwa (SAPS) ao neng le ka fa teng ga sefofane sa SAPS fa se ne se sugagana kwa Boemelafofaneng jwa Rand, kwa Germiston ka Labobedi wa la bo 30 Phatwe.
tgt_text: INyanga yaMafa.

src_text: Mapodisi batlisisa gore ke eng se se tlhodileng kotsi eno.
tgt_text: INyanga yaMafa kweyoMsintsi iza kukhunjulwa phantsi komxholo othi: “UkuBhiyozela ilifa lika-Solomon Linda kunye noMculo weMveli waseMzantsi Afrika”.

src_text: Kabinete beile mo dithapelong tsa pholo ya ka bonako motlhankedi yo leng mo dikgobalong tse di masisi yo neng fofisa sefofane seno  Go Thapiwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibongoza bonke abemi boMzantsi Afrika ukuba basebenzise iNyanga yaMafa ukubhiyozela inkcubeko yethu etyebileyo kunye neyantlukwano enamandla okumanya isizwe sethu.

src_text: Pele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang  Mme Gugulethu Abigail Thimane thapilwe go nna Motlatsamokaedikakaretso (DDG): mo Lephateng la go Disa Lekala la Puso le go Tlhatlhelela Badiredi mo Lefapheng la Tiromaano,Tekolo le Tshekatsheko ya Tiro  Mme Kwena Komape thapilwe go nna DDG: mo Lephateng la go Godisa Ikonomi, Kgwebisano le Tlotlomatso ya Serodumo mo Lefapheng la Temothuo, Pusetso ya Dinaga le Tlhabololo ya Metsemagae  Ngaka Bongani Elias Sithole thapilwe go nna DDG: mo Lephateng la Tikwatikwe ya Ditirelo tsa Botsamaisi jwa Ditiragalo tsa Matlhotlhapelo mo Lefapheng la Pusotshwaraganelo.
tgt_text: Sonke kufuneka sizibophelele ekusebenzeni kunye nokuphelisa iyantlukwano nokungabikho kobulungisa obenzeka kwixesha eladlulayo kwaye sikhuthaze ukuzingca ngokuba ngummi waseMzantsi Afrika     Imiyalezo.

src_text: Motlakase.
tgt_text: Amandla ombane.

src_text: Kabinete begetswe ke Tona ya Dikgwebo tsa Setšhaba Pravin Gordhan malebana le bokgoni jwa Eskom go fokotsa go timiwa ga motlakase kgapetsakgapetsa mme gape ya amogela pegelo ya tiro e setseng dirilwe go tswa kwa Komiting ya Setegeniki ya Komiti ya Bosetšhaba ya Mathata Motlakase.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi inikwe ingxelo emfutshane nguMphathiswa wamaShishini kaRhulumente u-Pravin Gordhan malunga namandla ka-Eskom okunciphisa ukucinywa kombane okwethutyana kwaye ikwafumene nengxelo yenkqubela-phambili evela kwiKomiti yobuGcisa yeKomiti yeSizwe yeNgxaki yezaMandla.

src_text: Go tla dirwa dikitsiso tse dingwe go latela go konosediwa ga dipuisano tse di tseneletseng malebana le dipegelo tseno.

Kabinete tlhagisitse go swaba ga yona ka ntlha ya dikgoreletsego tse di bakwang ke go timiwa ga motlakase mo dikgwebong le mo matlong, bogolo segolo jaaka seno se diragala ka nako puso samaganeng le ditsereganyo tse di itsisitsweng ke Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa ka Phukwi.
tgt_text: Ezinye izibhengezo ziza kwenziwa emva kokuqukunjelwa kweengxoxo ezinzulu zezi ngxelo.

src_text: Dipeeletso.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivakalise ukudana ngokuphazamiseka kunye nengxaki ebangelwe kukucima kombane koosomashishini nakumakhaya, ingakumbi okwenzeka ngeli xesha urhulumente eqalisa ukusebenza kwizithembiso ezazenziwe  nguMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa kweyeKhala yowama-.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse go tlhomiwa ga Setsha se sentšhwa sa Sandvik Khomanani Manufacturing kwa Kempton Park, se leng karolo ya peeletso e solofeditsweng kwa Khonferenseng ya bone ya Dipeeletso ya Aforika Borwa (SAIC) e neng tshwaretswe kwa Sandton Convention Centre kwa Johannesburg ka la bo 24 Mopitlwe..  Tlamelo eno ntšhwa ya disekweremetara di le 62 000 kopanya ditiro tse di neng di dirwa kwa ditsheng tse tlhano tse di farologaneng mme na le badiri ba ka nna.

Ke nngwe ya ditlamelo tsa Sandvik tse dikgolokgolo le tse di tsweletseng pele go gaisa mo lefatsheng, mme na le bokgoni jwa go tlhagisa dilaisi tsa ka fa tlase ga lefatshe ka dimatheriale tse di fetang 60% tsa Aforika Borwa.
tgt_text: Utyalo-mali.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse gape le leeto la Moporesidente Ramaphosa la go lekola maemo la kwa KwaZulu-Natala ka nako ya go tlhomiwa lefelo la tlhagiso ya dithoto la Hesto Harnesses kwa Stanger, KwaDukuza ka la bo 13 Lwetse.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukusungulwa kwe-Sandvik Khomanani Manufacturing Site e-Kempton Park, eyinxalenye yotyalo-mali oluzizigidi ezingama-350 zeerandi obeluthenjiswe kwiNkomfa yesine yoTyalo-mali yaseMzantsi Afrika (i-SAIC) ebibanjelwe kwiZiko leNgqungquthela laseSandton eRhawutini ngomhla wama-24 kweyoKwindla yowama-..     Eli ziko litsha elizizikwere zeemitha ezingama-62 000 lidibanisa imisebenzi ebiqhutywa ngaphambili kwiindawo ezintlanu ezahlukeneyo kwaye lingangena abasebenzi abamalunga nama-.

src_text: Lefelo leno ke le lengwe la diporojeke di le tlhano tse go dirilweng dipeeletso mo go tsona tse leng karolo ya maitlamo setlamo sa Metair Investments Limited go beeletsa  4 bilione go tshegetsa go atolosiwa le go fetolelwa ga Ford Ranger ntšhwa go nna ya ka fa nageng.
tgt_text: Lelinye lawona maziko e-Sandvik amakhulu  kwihlabathi jikelele nanobuxhaka-xhaka bale mihla kwaye lizawuvelisa iiloli zokulayisha emigodini.

src_text: Gape Moporesidente tsenetse pulo ya porojeke ya ntšhwafatso le katoloso ya setlamo sa Sappi Saiccor Mill ya boleng jwa R7,7 bilione kwa Umkomaas maikaelelo yona leng go oketsa bokgoni jwa setlamo le bokgoni jwa sona jwa go gaisana lefatshe ka bophara fa se ntse se tlhama ditšhono tsa tiro tsa pakakhutshwane le tsa pakatelele.
tgt_text: Umyinge ongaphezulu kwama-60% wezi ntsimbi ziza kusetyenziswa xa kusenziwa ezi loli uza kuveliswa apha eMzantsi Afrika..     IKhabhinethi ilwamkele utyelelo lukaMongameli Ramaphosa lokuya kuhlola KwaZulu-Natal ngethuba kusungulwa komzi-mveliso wakwa-Hesto Harnesses e-Stanger, KwaDukuza ngomhla we-13 kweyoMsintsi yowama-.

src_text: Dipeeletso tseno ke karolo ya ditsholofetso tse di dirilweng ke beng ba diintaseteri kwa SAIC.
tgt_text: Eli ziko lelinye leeprojekthi ezintlanu zotyalo-mali oluyinkunzi eliyinxalenye yebhiliyonii eyi-.

src_text: Peeletso nngwe le nngwe ntšhwa mo nageng ya rona thusa mo go ageng sešwa le go busetsa sekeng ikonomi ya rona, mme tswelela go dira gore Aforika Borwa nne lefelo leo leng mmamoratwa fa go tla mo go direng dipeeletso mo go lona.
tgt_text: 4 yeerandi eyathenjiswa ngabakwa-Metair Investments Limited kumalinge okuxhasa umsebenzi wokwandiswa kunye nokuveliswa apha ekhaya kwe-Ford Ranger etsha.

src_text: Tlhabololo ya mafaratlhatlha.
tgt_text: UMongameli ukwazimase ukuvulwa kweprojekthi yokuphucula nokwandisa i-Sappi Saiccor Mill exabisa iibhiliyoni eziyi-7,7 zeerandi e-Umkomaas, ejolise ekwandiseni nasekuphuculeni le nkampani itsho ikwazi ukukhuphisana kumgangatho wehlabathi  ngelixa ikwadala imisebenzi ezizingxungxo kunye nesisigxina.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse go bulwa ga karolo ntšhwa ya Tsela ya Musina Ring kwa Limpopo e tla dirang gore go nne bonolo gore batho ba tsamae kwa Musina, mme gape letla gore go nne le tiragatso ya kgwebisano le ikonomi magareng ga Aforika Borwa le Dinaga tsa Tlhabololo ya Borwa jwa Aforika.
tgt_text: Olu tyalo-mali luyinxalenye yezithembiso ezenziwe ngoosomashishini kwi-SAIC.

src_text: Porojeke e jeleng R640 milione tlhametse batho ba kgaolo eo ditiro tsa nako e tletseng di feta 275 mme ya tlamela baagi ba kgaolo eo le dikgwebopotlana (di-SMME) ka ditšhono.
tgt_text: Lonke utyalo-mali olutsha elizweni lethu lunceda ekwakhiweni ngokutsha nasekuvuseleleni uqoqosho lwethu, kwaye luyaqhubeka nokungqina ukuba uMzantsi Afrika ulilizwe elunamathuba amaninzi otyalo-mali.
