src_text: Kago ya Tsela ya Musina Ring ke karolo ya lenaneo la puso la dikago, leo le tseelang tlhogong maitlhomo ERRP, le maikaelelo lona leng go tlhama ditšhono tse botlhe ba nang le seabe mo go tsona le ditiro mo maphateng a farologaneng le mo metseng.
tgt_text: Uphuhliso lweziseko zophuhliso.

src_text: Matlhotlhapelo Jagersfontein.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukuvulwa kwecandelo elitsha le-Musina Ring Road e-Limpopo eliza kwenza kube lula ukuba abantu bahamba-hambe eMusina, likwavumele ukwandiswa kwemisebenzi yorhwebo neyoqoqosho phakathi koMzantsi Afrika kunye namazwe oMbutho woPhuhliso lwaMazantsi e-Afrika (i-SADC).

src_text: Kabinete rometse matshediso a tswang kwa botennye jwa dipelo kwa malapeng ba ba latlhegetsweng ke matshelo morago ga go thubega ga lebota la moepo o phuagantsweng wa kgaolo eno kwa Jagersfontein, kwa Foreisetata mme ga dutla kgosomano ya seretse se se bakileng matlhotlhapelo ka mahube naka tsa kgomo ka Sontaga, 11 Lwetse.
tgt_text: Le projekthi yezigidi ezingama-640 zeerandi idale imisebenzi esisigxina engama-275 yabahlali bale ngingqi yaze yabonelela ngamathuba kuluntu lwasekuhlaleni nakumashishini amancinane, aphakathi namancinane kakhulu (ii-SMME)..     Ukwakhiwa kwe-Musina Ring Road yinxalenye yenkqubo karhulumente yeziseko zophuhliso, ngokusebenzisa i-ERRP, ejonge ukudala uhlumo oluza kuxhanyulwa ngumntu wonke kunye namathuba engqesho kumacandelo ahlukeneyo nakuluntu.

src_text: Matlhotlhapelo ano sentse gape dikago tsa motse oo, dithoto tsa tsa batho di tshwana le dikoloi le dintlo di le mmalwa.
tgt_text: Intlekele yaseJagersfontein.

src_text: Ka nako ya fa ne etetse koo ka Mosupologo, 12 Lwetse 2022, Moporesidente Ramaphosa lebogile maiteko go busetsa maemo sekeng a dirwang mo lefelong leo ne solofetsa gape gore puso tla ema nokeng baagi ba ba amegileng ba Jagersfontein ka tshegetso e tlhokegang.
tgt_text: 1  IKhabhinethi ithi mazilale ngenxeba iintsapho zabo bathe basutywa kukufa emva kokugqabhuka kwedama lodaka lomgodi owavalwayo  wase-Jagersfontein e-Freystata lakhupha udaka olwenze umonakalo omkhulu ngentseni yangeCawa, umhla we-11 kweyoMsintsi ngowama-.

src_text: Kabinete lebogela gore beng ba moepo ba rile ba ikemiseditse go tlamela puso ka thuso ya setegeniki le tshegetso fa ka kopiwa ke Lekgotla la Diminerale la Aforika Borwa.
tgt_text: Le ntlekele iphinde yashiya izakhiwo zendawo, izinto zabantu ezifana nezithuthi kunye nezindlu ezininzi zonakaliswe kakhulu.. 2   Ngethuba lotyelelo lwakhe kummandla wentlekele ngoMvulo, umhla we-12 kweyoMsintsi ngowama-2022, uMongameli Ramaphosa uvakalise umbulelo ngeenzame zohlangulo nezovuselelo kulo mmandla.

src_text: Intaseteri ya meepo tswelela go nna le seabe se se botlhokwa mo ikonoming jaaka tlhagisa ditiro ka go thapa batho abo tsona le ka go thapa ditlamo tse tsona tla nnang tsona tse di thapang batho, ka go duelela letseno la go romela ditlhagisiwa tsa ka kwano kwa dinageng tsa kwa ntle, mmogo le ka go dira gore go nne le dipeeletso go tswa kwa dinageng tsa kwa ntle mmogo le go nna le seabe se se botlhokwa sa go tokafatsa matshelo batho ba ba mo tikologong ya meepo.
tgt_text: Ukwathembise ukuba urhulumente uzakubonelela ngenkxaso efanelekileyo kubahlali abachaphazelekayo baseJagersfontein.

src_text: Puso le mekgatlho mengwe e seng ya puso tlile ka thuso ya ka bonako ka go tlamela baagi ba ba amegileng ka bonno jwa tshoganyetso, ka go ba thoba maikutlo go ba ntsha mo letshogong le go ba thusa ka dithuso tse di botlhokwa di tshwana le go ba neela dikobo, dimaterase le diphuthelwana tsa dijo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikhuthazekile kukuba abanini balo mgodi bathe bakulungele ukunika uncedo lobugcisa nenkxaso kurhulumente ukuba banokucelwa benze njalo liBhunga lezeZimbiwa laseMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Ga jaana metsi le motlakase di buseditswe sekeng mo lefelong leo.
tgt_text: 3 Ishishini lezemigodi lisahleli linegalelo elibalulekileyo kuqoqosho ngokuqeshwa ngokuthe ngqo nangokungathanga ngqo, iingeniso evela kurhwebo namazwe angaphandle, kunye notyalo-mali oluthe ngqo lwangaphandle, kwaye lidlala indima ebalulekileyo ekuphuculeni ubomi babantu kwiindawo ezinemigodi.

src_text: Go solofetswe gore fela fa lefelo leno le sena go phepafadiwa, basetegeniki ba tla sekaseka seemo sa dikago tsa matlo.
tgt_text: 4 Urhulumente kunye neminye imibutho engekho phantsi kukarhulumente baye bangenelela ngokungxamisekileyo ngokubonelela ngeendawo zokuhlala ezingxamisekileyo, ululeko lwengqondo nangezibonelelo ezingundoqo ezifana neengubo, oomatrasi kunye nokutya.

src_text: Kabinete lebogile ditirelo tsa tshoganyetso, mekgatlho ya baagi le setšhaba ka ntlha ya seabe se ba nnileng le sona mo go abelaneng ka thuso.
tgt_text: Ubonelelo lwamanzi nombane kulo mmandla sele lubuyele esiqhelweni.

src_text: Ikonomi.

Kabinete buisane ka seemo sa ikonomi morago ga dipalopalo tsa fa gautshwane tsa Setheo sa Dipalopalo sa Aforika Borwa (Stats SA) di sena go bontsha gore Letseno la Ditlhagisiwa tsa Dikuno (GDP) la kotara ya bobedi ya 2022 wetse tlase ka 0,7%.
tgt_text: 5 Nje ukuba indawo yentlekele icociwe, amagcisa alindeleke ukuba enze uhlolo lweendonga zezindlu.

src_text: Dintlha tse di tlhotlheleditseng kwelotlase eno di akaretsa go timiwa ga motlakase, ntwa ya Russia le Ukraine, le dituelelo tse di kwa godimo tsa dilo tse go iphedisiwang ka tsona mmogo le infoleišene.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibulele iinkonzo zikaxakeka, imibutho yoluntu kunye namalungu oluntu ngeminikelo yesisa noncedo lwabo.

src_text: Ditsereganyo tse di dirilweng ke Leano la Kagosešwa le Tsosoloso ya Ikonomi (ERRP) di thusitse gore naga se dubiwe ke ditsuatsue tsa maemo boditšhabatšhaba ikonomi, mme gape di dirile gore ditiro le ditsela tsa go iphedisa di se latlhege.
tgt_text: Uqoqosho.

src_text: Ditsereganyo tse di gagametseng tsa puso tsa ikonomi di simolola go ungwa maungo, jaaka go bonagetse mo dipholong tsa fa gautshwane tsa Dipatlisiso tsa Kotara Nngwe le Nngwe tsa Merero ya Badiri tsa Stats SA, tse di bontshitseng gore go nnile le koketsego ya ditiro di feta 648 000 magareng ga kotara ya ntlha le kotara ya bobedi mo  Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ixoxe ngobume boqoqosho beli lizwe emva kokuba amanani akutshanje eZiko leeNkcukacha-manani loMzantsi Afrika (i-Stats SA) abonise ukuba ingeniso yemveliso yelizwe (i-GDP) yekota yesibini yowama-2022 yehle ngo-0,7%.

src_text: Letlhomeso la Peoleitlho le Tshekatsheko (M&E) la Pholisi ya Bosetšhaba ya Bašwa (NYP).
tgt_text: Izinto eziphembelele oku kwehla ziquka ukucinywa kombane, ungquzulwano lwaseRashiya ne-Ukraine, kunye neendleko eziphezulu zokuphila kunye nokunyuka kwamaxabiso.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse leano la go diragatsa tiro la M&E le le tla dirang gore tiro ya peoleitlho diragadiwe ka tshwanelo mmogo le tshekatsheko ya seabe sa dikarolo tse di botlhokwa tsa NYP 2020-.
tgt_text: Amanyathelo okungenelela enziwe siSicwangciso soKwakha ngokutsha kunye noVuselelo loQoqosho (i-ERRP) ubukhulu becala sithintele ilizwe kubunzima amashishini ajamelane nabo kwihlabathi, kwaye sakhusela imisebenzi kunye neendlela zokuphila.

src_text: Leano leno le tlamela ka dintlha di le tlhano tse di botlhokwa tsa maemo a kwa godimo tse di lepalepantsweng le dikarolo tse di botlhokwa tsa NYP.
tgt_text: Amanyathelo okungenelela ezoqoqosho aluqilima karhulumente aqalisa ukuvelisa iziqhamo, njengoko kungqinwe kwiziphumo zakutshanje ze-Stats SA zeKota zoVavanyo lwaBasebenzi, ezibonise ukuba kudalwe imisebenzi engaphezulu kwama-648 000 phakathi kwekota yokuqala neyesibini yowama-     Izigqibo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Dintlha tseno di dirilwe le baamegi ba ba maleba ba ba nang le kgatlhego mo tlhabololong le maatlafatso ya bašwa mo nageng.
tgt_text: Isicwangciso-nkqubo soBeko-liso noVavanyo (i-M&E) soMgaqo-nkqubo woLutsha lweSizwe (i-NYP).

src_text: Tshedimosetso e tla kokoanngwang tla aroganngwa go ya ka dingwaga, bong, bosemorafe le go ya ka mafelo bodulo dintlha tseno di tswang kwa go ona.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivume isicwangciso-nkqubo se-M&E esiza kunceda ukubeka iliso okusebenzayo kunye novavanyo lweempembelelo zeentsika ze-NYP yowama-2020 ukuya kowama-.

src_text: Ditiragalo tseno tsa go baya maemo leitlho di tla dirwa mo maphateng otlhe puso, mo ditheong le mo lephateng la poraefete.
tgt_text: Isicwangciso-nkqubo sibonelela ngezalathisi ezintlanu ezikwinqanaba eliphezulu ezihambelana neentsika ze-NYP.

src_text: Go tla kwala dipegelo tsa kotare nngwe le nngwe mme di phasaladiwe gabedi mo ngwageng.
tgt_text: Ezi zalathisi zaqulunqwa kubanjiswene namahlakaniafanelekileyo anomdla kuphuhliso nasekuxhotyisweni kolutsha kweli lizwe.

src_text: Leano la go Dira Tiro la Pholisi ya Thulaganyo e Golaganeng.
tgt_text: Iinkcukacha eziza kuqokelelwa ziza kujonga iminyaka yobudala, isini, ukukhubazeka, uhlanga ngokwebala kunye nendawo yokuhlala ngokwemimmandla yala mangenelelo..     Ukubeka iliso kuza kwenziwa kuwo onke amanqanaba karhulumente, kumaqumrhu nakumacandelo abucala.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula Leano la go Dira Tiro la Pholisi ya Thulaganyo e Golaganeng mo pusong, le le lebeletseng go samagana le mekhino e supilweng ya dithulaganyo tsa pholisi mo tsamaisong ya ga jaana ya dithulaganyo.
tgt_text: Iingxelo ziza kwenziwa ngekota kwaye zipapashwe kabini ngonyaka..     Isicwangciso-nkqubo soMgaqo-nkqubo woCwangciso oluDityanisiweyo.

src_text: Ditsereganyo tse di tshitshintsweng di tla samagana, gareng ga tse dingwe, le go tlhoka go lepalepanngwa ga dithulaganyo le didiriswa tsa peoleitlho.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi isivumile Isicwangciso-nkqubo soMgaqo-nkqubo woCwangciso oluDityanisiweyo kurhulumente, esijonge ukulungisa izikhewu eziboniweyo zocwangciso lomgaqo-nkqubo kwinkqubo yocwangciso yangoku.

src_text: Ditsereganyo di tla itsise sediriswa sa peoleitlho e theilweng mo bosuping.
tgt_text: Amanyathelo okungenelela acetywayo phakathi kwezinye izinto aza kujongana nokunqongophala kolungelelwaniso locwangciso phakathi kwamanqanaba amathathu karhulumente.

src_text: Gape letlhomeso la pholisi le tla itsise ponelopele e bonolo mme go na le dithulaganyo tsa pakatelele go ya go tsa pakagare le tsa pakakhutshwane go ralala puso.
tgt_text: Amanyathelo okungenelela azo kuqalisa indlela yokubeka iliso esekelwe kubungqina.

src_text: Le tla direla go itsise diphetogo tsa molao go tokafatsa tsamaelano le go bonela pele mo dithulaganyong le dipeoleitlho tsa puso.
tgt_text: Isicwangciso-nkqubo somgaqo-nkqubo sikwazisa ukuqikelelwa lula ngocwangciso lwexesha elide ukuya kwixesha eliphakathi kunye nelexesha elifutshane kurhulumente wonke.

src_text: Go Amogelwa ga Tumelano ya go Tlhamiwa ga Setheo sa Melemo sa Seaforika ( (AMA).
tgt_text: Siza kusebenzela ukwazisa uhlaziyo lwemithetho ukuze kuphuculwe ukuhambelana nokuqikelelwa kucwangciso kunye nokubekwa kweliso kukarhulumente..     Ukuvunywa kweSivumelwano sokuSekwa kwe-Arhente yaMayeza ase-Afrika (i-AMA).

src_text: Kabinete amogetse go saeniwa ga Tumelano ya go Tlhamiwa ga AMA le go neelwa ga yona kwa Palamenteng gore amogelwe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukutyikitywa kweSivumelwano sokuSekwa kwe-AMA kunye nokungeniswa kwaso ePalamente ukuze sivunywe.

src_text: Seno se tla dira gore tumelano e amogetsweng ke Kokoanotheomolao ya Mokgatlho o Tshwaraganetseng Aforika ka ngwaga wa 2019 tsenngwe tirisong.
tgt_text: Oku kuza kuzalisekisa isivumelwano esamkelwa yiNdibano yeManyano ye-Afrika ngowama-.

src_text: Tumelano tlhama AMA semmuso mo kontinenteng.
tgt_text: Esi sivumelwano siseka ngokusesikweni i-AMA yeli lizwekazi.

src_text: Setheo seno se tla laola ditlhagisiwa tsa kalafi, le go tokafatsa pabalesego le go dira ga ditlhagisiwa tsa kalafi mo kontinenteng.
tgt_text: I-arhente iza kulawula amayeza onyango, kwaye iphucule ukhuseleko kunye nokusebenza kwamayeza onyango kweli lizwekazi.

src_text: Go saeniwa le go amogelwa ga tumelano eno go tla tsweletsa maitlamo Aforika Borwa mo lefatsheng le mo kontinenteng malebana le go maatlafatsa thulaganyo ya taolo ya ditlhagiswa tsa yona tsa boitekanelo.
tgt_text: Ukutyikitya kunye nokuvunywa kungqina ukuba uMzantsi Afrika uzibophelele kwizivumelwano zeli lizwekazi nezehlabathi malunga nokuphucula imithetho yeli lizwekazi elawula iimveliso zalo zempilo..     Ingxelo ngokuSebenza kweNkqubo yesiBonelelo seRhafu yoPhando noPhuhliso (i-R&D) – yowama-2019/20 kunye neyowama-2020/..     IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukungeniswa ePalamente kweNkqubo yesiBonelelo seRhafu ye-R&D kule minyaka mibini idlulileyo (ngowama-2019/20 kunye neyowama-2020/21).

src_text: Pegelo ya Tiragatso ya Lenaneo la Thotloetso ya Lekgetho la Dipatlisiso le Tlhabololo (R&D) – 2019/20 le 2020/.
tgt_text: Oku kuhambelana necandelo 11D (17) loMthetho weRhafu yeNgeniso, wowe-1962 (uMthetho wama-58 wowe-1962), elifuna ukuba ezi ngxelo zandlalwe ePalamente.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse go neelwa ga Palamente ga pegelo ya Lenaneo la Thotloetso ya Lekgetho la R&D ya dingwaga tse pedi tse di fetileng (2019/20 le 2020/21).
tgt_text: Inkqubo yesibonelelo serhafu ijonge ukukhuthaza iinkampani zabucala ukuba zityale imali kwi-R&D ukuze zikhuthaze ukukhula kotyalo-mali.

src_text: Seno ke go tsamaelana le karolo 11D (17) ya Molao wa Lekgetho la Letseno wa ngwaga wa 1962 (Molao 58 wa 1962) o laelang gore go tlhagisiwe dipegelo tseno kwa Palamenteng.
tgt_text: Ivumela ukuqhubela-phambili kwenzululwazi kunye nobuchule bokuyilaobuza kunceda ekukhuleni koqoqosho, kwaye ikhuthaza ukhuphiswano.

src_text: Lenaneo la thotloetso ya lekgetho le ikaeletse go rotloetsa ditlamo tsa poraefete go beeletsa mo R&D go susumetsa kgolo ya dipeeletso.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ichulumancile kukuba le ngxelo ibonisa ukuba iinkampani ezintsha zifake izicelo zokufumana isibonelelo serhafu.

src_text: Le kgontsha tsweletso ya saense le boitshimololedi gore go nne le kgolo ya ikonomi, le go tsweletsa bokgoni jwa go gaisana.
tgt_text: Ikhuthaza iinkampani ezininzi ukuba zifake izicelo zokuxhamla esi sibonelelo njengenxalenye yokukhulisa utyalo-mali lwazo kunye nokukhwezela ukukhula koqoqosho.

src_text: Kabinete itumeletse gore pegelo bontsha gore ditlamo tse dintšhwa di dirile dikopo tsa thotloetso ya lekgetho rotloetsa ditlamo tse dingwe go fitlhelela sekema seno jaaka karolo ya go godisa dipeeletso tsa tsona le go tlhosetsa kgolo ya ikonomi.
tgt_text: Iinkampani ezine eziphezulu ezithe zasifumana esi sibonelelo serhafu zikwicandelo lokucola iimveliso zolimo; elezokuxhamlisa kwizimbiwa; elezamichiza, elezithambiso, elezamayeza kunye nelezobugcisa bezombane kunye nelezobuchwepheshe bolwazi ethe iKhabhinethi yawamkela njengemacandelo ekufuneka akhokeliswe phambili kwisiCwangciso sokuSebenza soMgaqo-nkqubo wezoShishino.

src_text: Ditlamo tse di kwa godimo tse nne tse di fitlheletseng thotloetso ya lekgetho di mo phetolong ya tsa temothuo; phetolo ya ditlhagiswa tsa meepo; maphata dikhemikhale, ditlolo, melemo le botegeniki jwa motlakase le Thekenoloji ya Tshedimosetso leng maphata Kabinete beileng gore ke ditlapele mo Thulaganyong ya Dikgato ya Pholisi ya Intaseteri.
tgt_text: Ingxelo epheleleyo inokufumaneka kwiwebhusayithi yeSebe lezeNzululwazi kunye noBuchule bokuYila:  www.dst.gov.za..     IQonga loMthetho lokuKhula kunye namaThuba ase-Afrika (i-AGOA) – yowama-.

src_text: Pegelo ka botlalo ka fitlhelelwa mo webosaeteng ya Lefapha la Saense le Boitshimololedi: www.dst.gov.za.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukusingathwa kweQonga le-AGOA ngowama-.

src_text: Foramo ya Molao wa Kgolo le Ditšhono wa Aforika (AGOA)–.
tgt_text: I-AGOA yaphunyezwa yiMelika (i-USA) ngowama-2000 ukuze yenze kube lula kumazwe amaninzi ase-Afrika akumazantsi e-Sahara ukurhweba ne-USA.

src_text: Kabinete itumedisiwa ke ditiragalo tsa gore go tla tshwarelwa ka fa nageng Foramo ya AGOA ka ngwaga wa.
tgt_text: Iimveliso zorhwebo zoMzantsi Afrika ezithunyelwa e-USA phantsi kwe-AGOA ziquka iziqhamo ezityiwayo, amandongomane, izithuthi, iintsimbi zemoto, intsimbi, isinyithi kunye neemveliso zemichiza.

src_text: AGOA simolotswe ke naga ya Amerika ka ngwaga wa 2000 go dira gore kgwebisano magareng ga dinaga tsa Borwa jwa Aforika le mmaraka wa dinaga tsa Amerika.
tgt_text: Owona mhla nendawo zisaza kubhengezwa.

src_text: Ditlhagisiwa tse Aforika Borwa di rekisetsang dinaga tsa kwa ntle ka fa tlase ga AGOA di akaretsa dijo tse di jewang, matokomane, dikoloi, dikarolo tsa dikoloi, tshipi le dikhemikhale.
tgt_text: Ingqungquthela yaBaphathiswa ye-Group on Earth Observations (i-GEO) –.

src_text: Letlha le lefelo di sa ntse di tla begwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivumile ukuba uMzantsi Afrika usingathe iNgqungquthela yaBaphathiswa ye-GEO eKapa ngowama-.

src_text: Samiti ya Ditona ya Setlhopha sa Tlhokomelo ya mo Lefatsheng (GEO) –.
tgt_text: I-GEO liqumrhu eliphakathi koorhulumente elasekwa ngowama-2003 emva kweNgqungquthela yeHlabathi yowama-2002 yoPhuhliso oluZinzileyo.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse gore Aforika Borwa tla tshwara Samiti ya Ditona ya GEO kwa Cape Town ka.
tgt_text: Isebenza njengeqonga lamazwe ngamazwe apho amazwe anikela ngokuzithandela kwinjongo enye yokwakha iinkqubo ze-GEO.

src_text: GEO ke setheo sa dipuso se se tlhomilweng ka 2003 morago ga Samiti ya Lefatshe ya 2002 ya Tlhabololo e Tsweletsegang dira jaaka polatefomo ya maphatamantsi moo dinaga di ithaopang go nna le seabe mo dikgatong tse di tshwaraganetsweng tsa tsamaiso ya GEO.
tgt_text: I-GEO ngoku inoorhulumente bamazwe abangaphezulu kwe-113, abangama-30 kubo bavela e-Afrika kunye nemibutho ethatha inxaxheba emalunga ne-140, kwaye i-11 lale mibutho livela e-Afrika.

src_text: Ga jaana mo go GEO go na le dipuso tsa bosetšhaba di feta 113, mme di le 30 mo go tsona di tswa mo kontinenteng ya Aforika mme go na le ditheo di ka nna 140 tse di nang le seabe, mme di le 11 tsa tsona di tswa mo Aforika.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika ube lilungu leKomiti Elawulayo elisebenzayo ukusukela ngowama-2005 kwaye iinzululwazi zethu ngoku zithatha inxaxheba kumaphulo ophando amaninzi akhokelwa yi-GEO.

src_text: Aforika Borwa ga a bolo go nna tokololo ya Komitikhuduthamaga e tsayang karolo go tloga ka ngwaga wa 2005 mme batlhankedi ba tsa saense ba naga ya rona ga jaana ba na le seabe mo ditiragalong di le mmalwa tsa boitshimololedi mo dipatlisisong tse di gogwang kwa pele ke GEO.
tgt_text: Inyanga yezoThutho yeDwarha (i-OTM) –.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Diphalane ya Dipalangwa (OTM) –.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukusungulwa kwephulo le-OTM ngoMgqibelo, umhla woku-1 kweyeDwarha yowama-2022, phantsi komxholo othi:  “Sishov’ingolovane: sisonke sakha iziseko zophuhliso zezothutho ezakha nezigcina indlela yokuphila”.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse go tlhomiwa ga letsholo la OTM ka Lamatlhatso, 1 Diphalane 2022, ka fa tlase ga moono: “Sishov’ingolovane: mmogo re aga mafaratlhatlha dipalangwa a agang le go tsweledisa boiphediso”.
tgt_text: I-OTM yonyaka isetyenziselwa ukwazisa ngezothutho njengenye yezinto ezibalulekileyo ekukhuleni koqoqosho kunye nophuhliso lweendawo ezihlala uluntu.

src_text: Letsholo la OTM la ngwaga le ngwaga le dirisediwa go oketsa temoso ya dipalangwa jaaka nngwe ya dikarolo tsa botlhokwa tsa kgolo ya ikonomi le tlhabololo ya dibaka.
tgt_text: Imisebenzi emininzi iza kwenziwa ukubonisa imiba eyahlukeneyo yeziseko zophuhliso lothutho kwezophapho, kwezaselwandle, kwezothutho lukawonke-wonke kunye neendlela.

src_text: Go tla nna le ditiragatso di le mmalwa go bontsha dintlha tse di farologaneng tsa mafaratlhatlha dipalangwa diphofo, mawatle, dipalangwa tsa botlhe le ditsela.
tgt_text: Le misebenzi iza kwazisa uluntu malunga nokhuseleko kunye nokhuselo lwezothutho.

src_text: Gape ditiragatso di tla oketsa temoso malebana le pabalesego le tshireletsego ya dipalangwa.
tgt_text: Iindibano zokubonisana namahlakani abachaphazelekayo nazo ziza kubanjwa ukuze kuxoxwe ngemiceli-mngeni eyahlukeneyo kwicandelo lezothutho.

src_text: Go tla nna gape le dipuisano le baamegi go buisanela dikgwetlho tse di farologaneng mo lephateng la dipalangwa.
tgt_text: Urhulumente usazibophelele ekuphuculeni iziseko zophuhliso zezothutho zeli lizwe, kwiindawo ezisemaphandleni kunye nasezidolophini, ukuze kube lula ukuthuthwa kweempahla kunye nabantu ngendlela esebenzayo nenempumelelo..     Intlanganiso yeZizwe Ezimanyeneyo (i-UN) neNkqubo yokuHlaliswa koLuntu (i-UN-HABITAT).

src_text: Puso sa ntse itlamile go tokafatsa mafaratlhatlha dipalangwa naga, kwa metsemagaeng le metsesetoropong, go dira gore go nne bonolo go nolofatsa motsamao wa dithoto le batho.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukusingathwa kwentlanganiso yamalungu e-UN-HABITAT eRhawutini ngomhla we-16 nowe-17 kweyeDwarha ngowama-.

src_text: Kopano ya Lenaneo la Ditšhabakopano la Manno Batho - Habitat (UN-HABITAT).

Kabinete amogetse go tshwarwa ga kopano ya ditokololo tsa UN-HABITAT kwa Johannesburg ka la bo 16 le la bo 17 Diphalane..  Lefapha la Manno Batho le tla gokaganya kopano eno ya matsatsi le mabedi e tla tsenelwang ke baeteledipele ba sepolotiki, badiri le babatlisisi, go akarediwa ditokololo tsa botlhokwa tsa Komiti ya Baemedi ba Leruri ba UN-HABITAT ba ba kwa Nairobi, Kenya.
tgt_text: ISebe lezokuHlaliswa koLuntu liza kuququzelela le ntlanganiso yeentsuku ezimbini eza kuzinyaswa ziintshatsheli zezopolitiko, iingcali kunye nabaphandi, kuquka namalungu abalulekileyo eKomiti yaBammeli abasiSigxina be-UN-HABITAT ezinze e-Nairobi, e-Kenya.

src_text: Dintlha tsa botlhokwa tse di tla buisanelwang di tla akaretsa go batla ditsereganyo tse di lereng diphetogo mo mafelong baipei le ditakana.
tgt_text: Imiba engundoqo eza kuxoxwa iza kuquka ukufuna amanyathelo okungenelela aza kuza notshintsho kwiindawo zoogob’ityholo kunye nakumatyotyombe..     Iziphumo zezi ngxoxo ziza kufikelela kuvuthondaba ngokusungulwa kweSicwangciso-nkqubo seSicwangciso sokuSebenza seHlabathi, esiza kuthiwa thaca kwiNdibano ye-UN-HABITAT ukuze sivunywe ngowama-     Imithetho eYilwayo.

src_text: Ditlamorago tsa dipuisano tseno di tla konosediwa ka go tlhomiwa ga Letlhomeso la Thulaganyo ya Ditiragatso e Akaretsang e tla tlhagisiwang kwa Kokoanonopeomolaong ya UN-HABITAT go tlhomamisiwa ka  Melao e Kwalolotsweng Sešwa.
tgt_text: Umthetho oYilwayo weBhunga leSizwe loBundlobongela obuSekwe kwiSini kunye nokuBulawa kwabaseTyhini (i-GBVF) wowama-..     IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukungeniswa koMthetho oYilwayo weBhunga leSizwe le-GBVF wowama-2021 ePalamente ukuze uqwalaselwe.

src_text: Molao o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Lekgotla la Naga la go Lwantshana le Ditiragalo tsa Pogiso le Polao ya Basadi le Basetsana (GBVF) wa.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo unika ingcaciso ngomthetho oza kusetyenziswa xa kusekwa iqumrhu elimiselwe ngokomthetho eliza kungqala ngqo kule ngxaki ye-GBVF..     Ukwakhululela ukuba kusekwe iBhodi yeli Bhunga eza kukhokela ize ibeke iliso kumalinge okuphunyezwa kwesiCwangciso-qhinga seSizwe se-GBVF, esavunywa yiKhabhinethi kweyeDwarha yowama-2020 ukuba masiqalise ukusebenza.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse gore Molao o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Lekgotla la Naga la go Lwantshana le Ditiragalo tsa Pogiso le Polao ya Basadi le Basetsana (GBVF) wa 2021 ka isiwa kwa Palamenteng go sekasekiwa.
tgt_text: Le bhodi iza kuba namalungu angama-51% avela kwimibutho yoluntu aze wona angama-49% aphume kurhulumente.

src_text: Molao yo Kwalolotsweng Sešwa yono tlhagisa leano la go tsamaisa tiro le le leng mo molaong le le laelang gore go tlhamiwe setheo sa molao se se tla samaganang ka tolamo le GBVF.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo sele ugwadliwe kwiindibano zovakaliso-zimvo zoluntu...     Umthetho oYilwayo woLawulo lweeMveliso zeCuba neMidiza e-Elektronikhi wowama-.

src_text: Molao ono gape laela gore go tlhamiwe le Boto ya Lekgotla e tla okamang maemo taolo ya setheo seno mmogo le go okama dikgato tsa go tsenya tirisong Thulaganyo ya Maano Naga GBVF Kabinete ka kgwedi ya Diphalane 2020 amogetseng gore tsenngwe tirisong.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukungeniswa koMthetho oYilwayo woLawulo lweeMveliso zeCuba neMidiza e-Elektronikhi wowama-2018 ePalamente, ojonge ukurhoxisa lo Mthetho woLawulo lweeMveliso zeCuba ukhoyo, wowe-1993 (uMthetho wama-83 wowe-1993), njengoko ulungisiwe.

src_text: Mo kemeding yotlhe ya boto eno 51% tla nna baagi mme 49% tla nna puso.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo ukwajonge ukuqinisa amanyathelo elizwe amalunga nezempilo yoluntu aze enziwe ukuba  ahambelane nesiVumelwano soMbutho wezeMpilo weHlabathi seSicwangciso-nkqubo soLawulo lweCuba kuLawulo lweCuba.

src_text: Dikgato tsa go batla maikutlo setšhaba ka molao ono di setse di garetswe.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo uphakamisa, phakathi kwezinye izinto, ukuba kubhangiswe tu ukutshaya ngaphakathi kwizakhiwo nakwezinye iindawo ezingaphandle kwezakhiwo;; ukubhangiswa kokuthengiswa kwecuba ngoomatshini bokuthengisa, futhi ukwaphucula neendlela amaqokobhe ecuba enziwa ngayo kunye nemibhalo yokulumkisa ebhalwe kuwo.

src_text: Molao o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Taolo ya Ditlhagiswa tsa Motsoko le Didirisiwa tsa Eleketeroniki tsa Motsoko le tsa go Goga Motsoko wa.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo uhliwe amahlongwane wade wacokiswa ngamahlakani achaphazelekayo ahlukeneyo, aquka amashishini ecuba, imibutho yoluntu kunye namasebe karhulumente afanelekileyo     Imisitho ezayo.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse dikgato tsa go isa kwa Palamenteng Molao o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Taolo ya Ditlhagiswa tsa Motsoko le Didirisiwa tsa Eleketeroniki tsa Motsoko le tsa go Goga Motsoko wa 2018 o batlang go phimola Molao wa ga jaana wa Taolo ya Ditlhagiswa tsa Motsoko wa ngwaga wa 1993 (Molao wa bo 83 wa 1993) go ya ka fao kwalolotsweng sešwa ka gone.
tgt_text: Iseshoni yama-77 yeNdibano Jikelele yeZizwe eziManyeneyo (i-UNGA77).

src_text: Gape Molao yo Kwalolotsweng Sešwa yono batla go maatlafatsa dikgato tsa naga tsa boitekanelo jwa setšhaba le go di lepalepanya le Tumelano ya Letlhomeso la Setheo sa Lefatshe sa Boitekanelo malebana le Taolo ya Motsoko.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika uthatha inxaxheba kwi-UNGA77 eqhubeka kundlunkulu we-UN kwisiXeko saseNew York e-USA ukusuka ngomhla wama-20 ukuya kowama-27 kweyoMsintsi ngowama-2022 phantsi komxholo othi:  “Ixesha lesiganeko sokuphawula utshintsho olubalulekileyo lwembali:  Ukuvula izisombululo zenguqu kwimiceli-mngeni edibanayo”.

src_text: Molao o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa yono tshitshinya, gareng ga tse dingwe, gore motsoko se tlhole gogelwa fa gare ga batho mo mafelong ka fa gare ga meago le mo mafelong mangwe kwa ntle ga meago; go ilediwa go rekisiwa ga metsoko mo metšhining e rekisang, mme ema nokeng ntlha e buang ka diphuthelwana tsa metsoko le ya matshwao tsiboso.
tgt_text: Umonakalo owenziwe ngubhubhane weNtsholongwane ye-Corona kuqoqosho nentlalo yamazwe akumazantsi e-Ikweyitha awufani xa uthelekiswa nesantya sokubuyela kwimo yesiqhelo kumazwe atyebileyo asemantla e-Ikhweyitha kwaye ufuna amazwe ehlabathi ukuba abambisane ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuba akukho mntu ushiyekelayo..     Ngaphambi kweNgxoxo-mpikiswano ye-UN, uNobhala-Jikelele we-UN, uMnu António Guterres, uza kubiza ingqungquthela "ngoTshintsho lweMfundo" kwaye abambe intlanganiso ekwinqanaba eliphezulu egxile kwiiNjongo zoPhuhliso oluZinzileyo (ii-SDGs).

src_text: Go dirilwe dikgato tse di tseneletseng tsa go batla maikutlo setšhaba le bao ba amegang ba ba farologaneng, go akarediwa intaseteri ya motsoko, mekgatlho ya baagi le mafapha a maleba puso  Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.
tgt_text: Intlanganiso yee-SDGs kulindeleke ukuba iphonononge iindlela zokubuyela kula moya wodlamko wangaphambili kunye nokukhawulezisa ukuphunyezwa kwazo.

src_text: Kopano ya bo77 ya Kokoanokakaretso ya Ditšhabakopano (UNGA77).
tgt_text: Usuku lwezaMasiko.

src_text: Aforika Borwa tla nna le seabe mo UNGA77 e diragalang kwa ntlokgolo ya UN kwa New York City kwa USA go tloga ka la bo 20 go fitlha ka la bo 27 Lwetse 2022 ka fa tlase ga moono: “Motlha wa diphetogo: Re bulela ditharabololo tsa diphetogo tsa dikgwetlho tse di golaganeng”.
tgt_text: UMongameli Ramaphosa uza kuba sisithethi sembeko kwimibhiyozo yoSuku lwezaMasiko yeSizwe ngowama-2022 kwiZakhiwo zoMdibaniso ngoMgqibelo, umhla wama-24 kweyoMsintsi ngowama-.

src_text: Mo dikarolong tse di mo Borwa mo lefatsheng, ditlamorago tsa ikonomi le tsa go itirela letseno ga baagi tse di bakilweng ke Bolwetse jwa Mogare wa Corona (COVID-19) ga di lekalekane le tsa dinaga tse di ikgonang kwa Bokone fa go lebeletswe go itharabologelwa ga dinaga tseno mme seno se tlhoka gore go nne le maiteko a tlhakanetsweng ditšhaba tsotlhe go netefatsa gore ga go ope yo salelang kwa morago.
tgt_text: Lo Mnyhadala uza kubanjwa phantsi komxholo othi:  “UkuBhiyozela imiSebenzi kaSolomon Linda kunye noMculo weMveli waseMzantsi Afrika”..     Inyanga yaMasiko kulo nyaka igxile kumculo wemveli woMzantsi Afrika ize igxininisa kakhulu kumculo weSsicathamiya kunye negalelo lawo elikhulu kwimidlalo yethu, ubugcisa, inkcubeko kunye namasiko.

src_text: Pele ga Kopano ya UN ka Dingangisano tsa Merero ka go Farologana, Rre António Guterres tla bitsa samiti ya “Go fetola Thuto” mme go tla tshwarwa kopano e tsenelwang ke batho ba maemo a kwa godimo mme mogopolo mo kopanong eno tla tsepamisiwa mo Dipeelong tsa Tlhabololo tse di Nnelang Ruri (di-SDG).
tgt_text: Lo mxholo unika imbeko kwisikhumbuzo seminyaka engama-60 yokusweleka kwemvumi, umculi kunye nomqambi wengoma, uSolomon Popoli Linda (1909-1962), nowaziwa njengoSolomon Ntsele, nowaziwa kakhulu njengomqambi wengoma ethi, “Mbube”.

src_text: Go solofetswe gore kopano ya di-SDG tlhotlhomise ditsela tsa go busetsa motsamao le go akofisa tsenyotirisong ya tsona.
tgt_text: UMnyhadala Onxuseneyo woSuku lwezaseLwandle weHlabathi wowama-2022 .

src_text: Letsatsi la Ngwaoboswa.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika uza kusingatha uMnyhadala Onxuseneyo woSuku lwezaseLwandle weHlabathi ngowama-2022 e-Durban ukusuka ngomhla we-12 ukuya kowe-14 kweyeDwarha ngowama-.

src_text: Moporesidente Ramaphosa tla neela puo ya letsatsi kwa meletlong ya Letsatsi la Bosetšhaba la Ngwaoboswa la 2022 kwa Union Buildings ka Lamatlhatso, 24 Lwetse.
tgt_text: Lo Mnyhadala uza kubanjwa ngexesha le-OTM, nayo eza kuba yinxalenye yokufundisa ngecandelo lethu lezaselwandle.

src_text: Tiragalo eno tla tshwarwa ka fa tlase ga moono: “Re keteka Boswa jwa ga Solomon Linda le Mmino wa Setso wa Aforika Borwa”.
tgt_text: Lo msitho uza kuzinyaswa ngabathunywa abavela kumazwe ahlukeneyo abazakuzibonela ngokwabo icandelo lezaselwandle loMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Ngwaoboswa monongwaga bua ka mmino wa setso wa Aforika Borwa, go totilwe mmino wa Isicathamiya gammogo le seabe se segolo se nnileng le sona mo metshamekong, botsweretshing, setsong le mo ngwaobosweng.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika ube lilungu loMbutho waMazwe ngaMazwe waseLwandle ukusukela ngowe-1995, oyi-arhente ekhethekileyo ye-UN enoxanduva lokulawula uthutho lweenqanawa.

src_text: Moono wa teng tlotlomatsa segopotso sa bo 60 sa go tlhokafala ga rammino le motlhami yono wa mmino, Solomon Popoli Linda (1909-1962), yo gape itsegeng jaaka Solomon Ntsele, yo itsegeng thata jaaka motlhami wa pina ya “Mbube”.
Tiragalo e Diragalang mmogo ya Letsatsi la Lefatshe la Dikepe ya.
tgt_text: Inyanga yoKhenketho.

src_text: Aforika Borwa tla bo tshwere Mokete wa Letsatsi la Lefatshe la Mawatle o Diragalang mmogo le wa Kgwedi ya Diphalane ya Dipalangwa (OTP) ya 2022 kwa Durban go tloga ka la bo 12 go fitlha ka la bo 14 Diphalane.
tgt_text: Inyanga yoKhenketho kulo nyaka ibhiyozelwa phantsi komxholo woSuku loKhenketho lweHlabathi (ngomhla wama-27 kweyoMsintsi) othi “Ukucinga ngokutsha uKhenketho”.

src_text: Mokete ono tla tshwarwa ka nako le nngwe le ya go keteka OTM le yona tla bong le karolo ya go tsweletsa temoso ya lephata la rona la dikepe.
tgt_text: Ukhenketho lwasekhaya lubalulekile ekuvuseleleni icandelo lezokhenketho, elinegalelo elikhulu kwi-GDP yoMzantsi Afrika nakumalinge okudala imisebenzi.

src_text: Mokete ono tla tsenelwa ke bannaleseabe go tswa kwa dinageng tse di farologaneng ba ba tla itemogelang intaseteri ya dikepe ya Aforika Borwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ichulumancile kukuba icandelo lokwamkela iindwendwe libone ukunyuka kwenani labantu abangabatyeleli emva kwexesha le-COVID-.

src_text: Aforika Borwa sale le tokololo ya Mokgatlho wa Boditšhabatšhaba wa Mawatle go tloga ka 1995 leng setheo se se itlhophileng sa UN se maikarabelo sona leng go laola dithulaganyo tsa go rwala dithoto tse di romelwang ka dikepe.
tgt_text: Aba bantu bazizigidi eziyi-.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Bojanala.
tgt_text: 2 bathathe uhambo apha ngaphakathi elizweni kwisiqingatha sokuqala sowama-2022 babonakalisa ukuba inani labantu abathatha uhambo linyuke nge-114% xa kuthelekiswa neli xesha linye ngowama-.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Bojanala monongwaga ketekwa ka fa tlase ga moono wa Letsatsi la Lefatshe la Bojanala (27 Lwetse) wa “Re akanya sešwa ka ga Bojanala”.
tgt_text: Oku kubonise ukunyuka kakhulu kwenani labantu abathatha uhambo xa kuthelekiswa neli xesha linye ngowama-2019, apho ibingabantu abazizigidi eziyi-8,6 abathe bathatha uhamba apha ekhaya.

src_text: Bojanala jwa ka fa nageng bo botlhokwa mo go itharabologelweng ga lephata la Bojanala, le le nang le seabe se segolo mo Letsenong la Ditlhagisiwa tsa Dikuno (GDP) la ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa le go tlhamiwa ga ditiro.
tgt_text: Njengenxalenye yokubhiyozela iNyanga yoKhenketho, iKhabhinethi ikhuthaza abemmi boMzantsi Afrika ukuba bathabathe inxaxheba kwiphulo lokhenketho olubizwa nge-‘Shotleft’ batyelele amaphondo ethu ohlukeneyo.

src_text: Kabinete itumeletse gore lephata la Bojanala le nnile le koketsego ya baeti morago ga paka ya COVID-.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwasamkele isigqibo se-Air Belgium sokuba neenqwelo-moya  ngamaxesha athile onyaka eziza kuza eMzantsi Afrika, ukusukela kule nyanga (kweyoMsintsi), nto leyo eza kuphucula ukhenketho kwaye iqinise ngakumbi iwonga lethu njengendawo yokhenketho ethandwayo ngabakhenkethio.

src_text: Maeto a tserweng ka fa nageng ke le.
tgt_text: I-Air Belgium iza kuba neenqwelo-moya zeveki eziya eKapa naseRhawutini     Imiyalezo.

src_text: 2 milione a tserweng mo karolong ya ntlha ya 2022 mme bontshitse koketsego ya 114% fa go bapisiwa le paka eo ka.
tgt_text: Amazwi okuvuyisana     Ikhabhinethi ithumela amazwi okuvuyisana kunye neminqweno emihle: kuMongameli William Samoei Ruto weRiphabliki yaseKenya, othe wabekwa ngokusesikweni ngoLwesibini, umhla we-13 kweyoMsintsi ngowama-2022, emva konyulo lukazwelonke olunoxolo obelubanjwe ngomhla we-9 kweyeThupha ngowama-.

src_text: Seno se bontshitse tokafalo e bonalang mo pakeng eo ka 2019, mo go nnileng le maeto a ka fa nageng le.
tgt_text: Usekela-Mongameli u-David Mabuza ubezimase lo msitho wokubekwa ngokusesikweni egameni likaMongameli Ramaphosa, kunye norhulumente kunye nabantu beRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: 6 milione.
tgt_text: kuMbutho woMbhoxo waseMzantsi Afrika kunye neSixeko saseKapa ngokusingatha ngempumelelo itumente yesibhozo yeNdebe yeHlabathi yoMbhoxo ye-Sevens phakathi komhla we-9 kunye nowe-11 kweyoMsintsi ngowama-.

src_text: Jaaka karolo ya go keteka Kgwedi ya Bojanala, Kabinete rotloetsa MaAforika Borwa go tsaya maeto ‘Shotleft’ go ya kwa diporofenseng tse di farologaneng.
tgt_text: Oku ibikokokuqala ukuba lo mnyhadala ubalulekileyo usingathwe lilizwe lase-Afrika kwaye amawaka amaninzi abalandeli abebezimasile bayoliswa ngetheko lombhoxo kunye nobubele odume ngabo uMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Gape Kabinete neseditse pula tshwetso ya setlamo sa Air Belgium go bulela difofane tse di tswang kwa nageng eo go leba ka fa Aforika Borwa, go simolola ka kgwedi yona eno (ya Lwetse) leng se se tla godisang bojanala le go dira gore re tsetsepele mo maemong rona go nna mmamoratwa fa go tla mo go tsa bojanala.
tgt_text: Amazwi ovelwano      IKhabhinethi ivakalisa amazwi ovelwano kusapho nakubahlobo: babantwana besikolo abali-18 kunye nabantu abadala ababini abasweleke kwingozi emanyukunyezi e-Pongola, KwaZulu-Natal ngoLwesihlanu, ngomhla we-16 kweyoMsintsi yowama-2022 emva kokuba ilori esisigadla esinamatroko ithe yangqubana okweenkunzi zegusha kunye neveni ebithwele abafundi     Izikhundla.

src_text: Tsona di tla akaretsa difofane tsa beke le beke go ya Cape Town le Johannesburg  Melaetsa.
tgt_text: Zonke izikhundla zixhomekeke ekuqinisekisweni kwamabakala emfundo kunye nokuqinisekiswa okufanelekileyo kwezokhuseleko     UMnu Makgothi Samuel Thobakgale njengoMlawuli-Jikelele (i-DG):  UMkomishinala weSizwe weSebe leeNkonzo zoLuleko     UGq Malixole Percival Mahlati njengeSekela lika-DG: Iinkonzo zeMpilo zeziBhedlele zaMaziko eMfundo Ephakamileyo kunye noPhuhliso lwezaBasebenzi kwiSebe lezeMpilo     UMnu Siyabonga Blessing Mdubeki njengoNocanda-Jikelele oyiNtloko kwiSebe lezoLimo, uBuyekezo loMhlaba noPhuhliso lwasemaPhandleni     UMnu Phaswa Phineas Mamogale njengeGosa eliyiNtloko lezeziMali kwiSebe lezeMpilo..     IKhabhinethi ivume ukuqeshwa kwaba balandelayo     UMnu Tshediso Matona njengoMkomishinala weKomishoni yokuXhotyiswa kwabaMnyama ngokuBanzi kwezoQoqosho     Amalungu eSigqeba seziBheno seBhodi yeFilimu noPapasho:  UMnu Siyazi Tyamtyam (uSihlalo); UNksz Sohani Natasha Chundhur;UNksz Sisanda Nkoala;UNks Shandukani Mulaudzi;UNks Nomaswazi Rachel Shabangu-Mndawe;UGq Litheko Modisane;UMnu Phuti Nehemia Phukubje;UMnu James Shikwambana; kunyenoNksz Manko Thalitha Bufffel (uqeshiwe kwakhona).

src_text: Tshomarelo ya Metsi.
tgt_text: Ugcino lwamanzi.

src_text: Kabibete lebogile Maaforika Borwa jaaka ba ikobetse dikgato tsa go somarela metsi tse di tsentsweng tirisong mo dikarolong tse di rileng tsa Johannesburg, Tshwane le Ekurhuleni go dira bonnete jwa gore matamo metsi ga kgale.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibulele abemi boMzantsi Afrika ngokuthobela izithintelo zokusebenzisa amanzi eziphunyezwe kwiindawo ezithile zaseRhawutini, eTshwane nase-Ekurhuleni ngeenzame zokuzinzisa umthamo omumethwe ngoovimba bamanzi.

src_text: Metsi mo matamong le mo madutelong metsi tswelela go dirisiwa ka bontsi ka ntlha ya dithemphereitšha tse di kwa godimo go ralala Gauteng, mme tiriso eno ya metsi e kwa godimo bakile gore Rand Water fokotse thata metsi e tlamelang bommasepaleng.
tgt_text: Amadama kunye noovimba banomthamo ongaphantsi koxinzelelo ngenxa yobushushu obukwiqondo eliphezulu e-Gauteng, kwaye ukwanda kwemfuneko yamanzi kunyanzelise i-Rand Water ukuba icuthe ngesaquphe unikezelo lwamanzi kwaba masipala.

src_text: Setheo se sa tlamelo ya metsi se tlamela ka metsi mantsi go batho ba feta dimilione tse 11 mo Gauteng le mo dikarolong tsa Mpumalanga, Foreisetata le Bokone Bophirima..   Maikaelelo dikgato tseno tsa go somarela metsi, tse go seng tsela epe re ka di tilang ka yona, ke go dira bonnete jwa gore re nne le metsi a sa kgaleng mme re tla tswelela go ikobela tsona go fitlha maemo tokafala.
tgt_text: Eli ziko lamanzi libonelela ngobuninzi bamanzi aselwayo kubantu abangaphezu kwezigidi ezili-11 e-Gauteng, kwiindawo zaseMpumalanga, eFreystata naseMntla Ntshona.

src_text: Kabinete ikuetse go baagi go tswelela go ikobela dikgato tsa go somarela metsi le go nna le seabe mo go diriseng metsi ka tshomarelo..   Go Ngala Ditiro kwa Transnet.
tgt_text: Ezi zithintelo esingakwaziyo ukuzibaleka zenzelwe ukuqinisekisa ukuba siyaqhubeka nokuphaka amanzi ngendlela ezinzileyo, kwaye zisezakuhlala zikhona de imeko ibe bhetele.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse tumelano ya meputso go dumelanweng ka yona ya dingwaga tse tharo magareng ga Transnet le United National Transport Union (UNTU) e tsenang tirisong go tloga ka la bo 1 Moranang 2022 go fitlha ka la bo 31 Mopitlwe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ihlabe ikhwelo kuluntu ukuba luqhubeleke luyithobela imiqathango yothintelo lwamanzi kwaye ludlale indima yalo ngokusebenzisa ngokonga amanzi kuba abaluleke kakhulu futhi anqongophele..   Ugwayimbo lakwa-Transnet.

src_text: Khomišene ya Thuanyo, Tsereganyo le Katlholelo tseregantse mo tumelanong e e tlisitseng boipelaetso ba ditokololo tsa UNTU kwa bokhutlong ka gangwe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi isamkele isivumelwano semivuzo yeminyaka emithathu ekufikelelwe kuso phakathi kuka-Transnet nombutho wabasebenzi i-United National Transport Union (i-UNTU), esi sivumelwano sizosebenza ukusuka kumhla woku-1 kuTshazimpunzi 2022 ukuya kowama-31 kweyoKwindla.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse gape tshwetso ya South African Transport and Allied Workers Union ya go fedisa go ngala ditiro.
tgt_text: IKomishini yoXolelwaniso, kunye noLamlo ingenelele ngokulamla esi sivumelwano esenze ukuba luphele ngoko nangoko ugwayimbo obeluqhutywa ngamalungu e-UNTU.

src_text: Kabinete leboga boineelo jo bo dirilweng ke Transnet mabapi le go tsepamisa mogopolo mo tirong e saletseng kwa morago mo ditirelong tsa go rwala dithoto ka dikepe le diterene e bakilweng ke go ngala ditiro leng se se amileng ikonomi le makala a ikaegileng ka ditirelo tse ka tsela e sa itumediseng..   Kabinete lebogile tshegetso le tirisanommogo e neetsweng ke lekala la kgwebo mo pakeng ya go ngala ditiro.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwasamkele isigqibo sombutho i-South African and Allied Workers Union (i-SATAWU) sokurhoxisa olu gwayimbo.

src_text: Tshegetso eno rotloetsa kamano e tswelelang magareng ga boeteledipele ba Transnet le badiri leng se se tla tswelang mosola setlamo se le ikonomi ya naga..   Dikamano tsa Aforika Borwa – Saudi Arabia.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukuzibophelela kuka-Transnet ekubeni agxininise ekugqibeni umsebenzi osemva okuwo wonke amazibuko noololiwe obangelwe lolu gwayimbo, oluchaphazele uqoqosho kunye namacandelo axhomekeke kwiinkonzo zale arhente.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse Leeto la Tiro le le atlegileng kwa Pusong ya Saudi Arabia ka Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa ka la bo 15 le la bo 16 Diphalane.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivakalise umbulelo wayo kwinkxaso nentsebenziswano ebisuka kwabezoshishino ngethuba logwayimbo.

src_text: Mo leetong le, dinaga tse pedi tse di saenile Dimemorantamo tsa Tirisanommogo (di-MoU) mo makaleng a farologaneng a jaaka la temothuo, la bodirelatlhapi, la meepo, la metlakase e fetlhiwang ka ditsela tse dintšhwa, la tshireletso, la dipalangwa le la temothuo ya ditlhagisiwa tsa mo metsing.
tgt_text: Ikhuthaza ubudlelwane obukhona phakathi kwabalawuli bakwa-Transnet nabasebenzi ukuze kuxhamle inkampani noqoqosho lwelizwe.

src_text: Di-MoU tse dingwe tse di saenilweng di ka ga go tlhongwa ga Lekgotla la Kgwebo ya Motlhakanelwa, tirisano mo diintasetering tsa sesole le theko, gammogo le tirisano mo makaleng dipatlisiso tsa thutamaje.
tgt_text: Ubudlelwane boMzantsi Afrika ne-Saudi Arabia.

src_text: Moporesitente dirisitse leeto le go laletsa dikgwebo tsa Saudi Arabia go tsenela khonferense ya botlhano ya peeletso ya Aforika Borwa e tla tshwarwang ka.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ilwamkele uTyelelo lokuSebenza lukaMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa e-Kingdom of  Saudi Arabia olubeyimpumelelo, lwangomhla we-15 nowe-16 kweyeDwarha.

src_text: Saudi Arabia ke mogwebisani le Aforika Borwa wa maemo bobedi ka bogolo mo Dinageng tsa Botlhabagare bile ke lefelo le legolo le dinaga tsa kgaolo eno di rekang mo go lona ditlhagisiwa.
tgt_text: Kolu tyelelo, la mazwe mabini atyikitye iZivumelwano Zokusebenzisana (ii-MoU) ezili-17 kumacandelo ohlukeneyo afana nezolimo, ezokuloba, ezemigodi, amandla ombane ohlaziyekayo, ukhuseleko, ezothutho kunye nezolimo lwasemanzini.

src_text: Dikamano tsa boditšhaba magareng ga dinaga tsoopedi di nnile le seabe se sentle mo mererong ya kgwebisano le bobeeletsi..   Peeletso mo Mafaratlhatlheng.
tgt_text: Ezinye ii-MoU ezityikityiweyo zisekusekweni kweBhunga lezoShishino eliDityanelweyo, intsebenziswano kushishino lomkhosi nokuthengwa kwempahla, kunye nentsebenziswano kuphando lwejiyoloji.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse go thankgololwa ga polante ya tlhagiso ya maemo a kwa godimo ka motlhagisi yo gaisang wa boditšhaba, ALPLA Group, kwa Lanseria mo Gauteng.
tgt_text: UMongameli usebenzise olu tyelelo ukumema amashishini ase-Saudi Arabia kwinkomfa yesihlanu yotyalo-mali eMzantsi Afrika eza kubanjwa ngonyaka wama-.

I-Saudi Arabia ililizwe elikwindawo yesibini ngokomthamo  wezorhwebo kumazwe arhweba noMzantsi Afrika kummandla woMbindi Mpuma, kwaye eli lizwe lingowona mthombo mkhulu wezinto ezithengwayo ezingena eMzantsi Afrika ezivela kulo mmandla.

src_text: Se se netefatsa boineelo ba ga Moporesitente Ramaphosa ba go tlhoma tlhabololo ya mafaratlhatlha jaaka tsela e ka tsosang ikonomi le go oketsa ditiro..   Peeletso ya bokana ka didolara tse dimilione tse 50 ke seabe sa botlhokwa mo leaning le legolong la Toropokgolo ya Ditirodintsi ya Lanseria e tla kgweetsang tswelelo le tirisogape gammogo le go tlhola le go boloka ditiro tse.
tgt_text: Ubudlelwane phakathi kwala mazwe omabini bunesiqhamo esihle kurhwebo notyalo-mali.

src_text: Mo go yona go akarediwa lenaneo la go ithutela tiro la baithutela mekhateroniki ba le 36 le borathekeniki ba tirisogape ba ditirelo tsa ALPLA go ralala borwa jwa Aforika.
tgt_text: Utyalo-mali kwiziseko zophuhliso.

src_text: Lenaneo la go ithutela tiro le tla simolola ka 2023, mme baithutela tiro ba ntlha ba le 12 ba Aforika Borwa ba tla bo ba tswa mo mafelong selegae..   Ditiragalo tsa Meepo tse di seng mo Molaong.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukuqaliswa kwamalungiselelo okwakha iziko elikumgangatho ophezulu lokuvelisa iiplastiki yinkampani ephambili kwihlabathi, , i-ALPLA Group, e-Lanseria e-Gauteng.

src_text: Ditiragalo tsa meepo tse di seng mo molaong di phuaganya metse mo setšhabeng sa borona mmogo le ikonomi ya rona, le go baka tatlhegelo ya lotseno go bobedi puso le lekala la meepo..   Kabinete itumedisitswe ke go amogiwa moselesele wa ditlhobolo le go tshwarwa ga babelaelwa ba le 20 ba ba golaganngwang le ditiragalo tsa meepo tse di seng mo molaong ka nako ya letsholo le le neng la dirwa kwa šafoteng ya moepo wa Stilfontein kwa Bokone Bophirima..   Kabinete ikuela go Maaforika Borwa go tswelela go dirisana le ditheo tsa molao go dira bonnete jwa gore matsholo thibelo ya bosenyi isago le ona atlega.
tgt_text: Oku kongeza ekuzinikeleni kukaMongameli Ramaphosa ekubekeni uphuhliso lweziseko ezingundoqo njengendlela yokuvuselela uqoqosho nokwandisa imisebenzi.

src_text: Se se tla romela molaetsa o bogale wa gore bosenyi ga bo duele, le gore disenyi di tla tshwarwa le go sekisiswa ntle le poifo kgotsa kgethololo..   Motlakase.
tgt_text: Olu tyalo-mali oluxabisa ama-50 ezigidi zeedola zaseMelika ligalelo elingundoqo kwisicwangciso esikhulu sedolophu yale mihla, ii-Lanseria Smart City esiceba ukuqhuba uzinzo kunye nohlaziyo lweemveliso kwanokudala nokugcina imisebenzi engama-.

src_text: Go sale gale Eskom saenile ditumelano tsa kadimo tsa dingwaga tse 30 le babeeletsi ba bafetlhi ba ba ba ikemetseng ba motlakase ba le bane go aga mothamo mošwa wa go fetlhiwa ga motlakase o phepa kwa diteišeneng tsa motlakase tsa Majuba le Tutuka kwa Mpumalanga.
tgt_text: Kukwabandakanywe nenkqubo yokuqeqeshelwa umsebenzi kubasebenzi abangama-36 abazakuba ziingcaphephe zokusebenza ngoomatshini neengcali zokuhlaziya iinkunkuma ibeyimveliso entsha kwimisebenzi yeenkampani ye-ALPLA Group kuwo wonke amazwe  akumazantsi e-Afrika.

src_text: Dikadimo tse tsa lefatshe di tla ngoka peeletso e lekanyediwang go diranta di le dibilione tse.
tgt_text: Inkqubo yokuqeqeshelwa umsebenzi iza kuqalisa ngonyaka wama-2023, abafundi bokuqala abali-12 baseMzantsi Afrika bazakuba bephuma kuluntu lwasekuhlaleni.
Ukwembiwa kwemigodi ngokungekho mthethweni.

src_text: Babeeletsi ba bane ba - HDF Energy South Africa, Red Rocket SA, Sola Group le  Mainstream Renewable Power Developments South Africa – ba tla tsenya bonnye dimekawate di le 2 000 mo mafaratlhatlheng motlakase bosetšhaba..   Mothamo mošwa wa go fetlhwa ga motlakase solofelwa go golaganngwa mo mafaratlhatlheng motlakase mo dikgweding tse 24 go ya go 36 go tloga ka konosetso ya tsa matlole, go ikaegilwe ka ditetlelelo tsa tikologo, tlhaolo ya lefatshe le tse dingwe tsa taolo..   Dikgato tsa go Dira Bonnete jwa gore Naga ga Tlhaele Dijo.
tgt_text: Ukwembiwa kwemigodi ngokungekho mthethweni kulimaza uluntu kunye noqoqosho lwethu, kwaye kukhokelela kwilahleko yengeniso karhulumente nakwicandelo lezemigodi.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse gore Kopano ya Agri SA ya 2022 tshwarelwe kwa Pretoria ka la bo 13 le la bo 14 Diphalane 2022 ka fa tlase ga setlhogo: “Re Kotula seo re se Jetseng ka fa Nageng”.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukuthinjwa kwemipu emininzi kunye nokubanjwa kwabarhanelwa abangama-20 aboyamene nokwembiwa kwemigodi ngokungekho mthethweni ngethuba kuqhutywa iphulo lokulwa nolu lwaphulo-mthetho kumgodi wase-Stilfontein eMntla Ntshona.

src_text: Kopano e ne buisanela merero e jaaka go dira gore maanomagolo temothuo direle balemi ba naga; mafaratlhatlha a boikanyego tlhagiso ya dijo ya selegae go isa isagong, le go matlafatsa bokgoni ba batlhagisi ba dijo go dira ka ditlhagiswa tse di jetsweng mono..   Mo dikgatong tse dingwe gape tsa go dira bonnete jwa gore naga ga tlhaele dijo, Kabinete amogetse gape go thankgololwa ga Sefala sa Bosetšhaba sa Tshireletso ya Dimela le Diphologolo, ke Lenaneo la Semphato sa Itlhamelo mo go tsa Temothuo le Ikonomi ya Dimela le Diphologolo sa Lefapha la Saense le Boitlhamelo, ka tirisano le Yunibesithi ya Pretoria.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibongoza abemi boMzantsi Afrika ukuba baqhubeleke nokusebenzisana nee-arhente zogcino-mthetho ukuze kuqinisekwe ukuba nakwilixa elizayo amaphulo okulwa nolwaphulo-mthetho abayimpumelelo.

src_text: Sefala se se tla tshegetsa thibelo, phokotso le taolo ya malwetse dimela le diphologolo leng se se tla oketsang tlhagiso, tshireletso ya dijo le tlhabololo e tsepameng ya metsemagae   Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: Oku kuza kuthumela umyalezo ongqongqo wokuba ulwaphulo-mthetho alunanzuzo, kwaye izaphuli-mthetho ziza kubanjwa, zitshutshiswe ngaphandle koloyiko okanye ukwenzelela.

src_text: Mametlelelo ya Tšhata ya Tsamaiso e seng ya Bogareng ya Mokgatlo wa Tirisano ya Aforika (AU).
tgt_text: Amandla ombane.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse go romelwa kwa Palamenteng ga Tšhata ya AU ka ga Meono le Melawana ya Tsamaiso e Seng ya Bogareng, Bobusi ba Selegae le Tlhabololo ya Selegae gore mametlelelwe.
tgt_text: Kutshanje u-Eskom utyikitye izivumelwano zengqeshiso yomhlaba zeminyaka engama-30 nabatyali-zimali abane abazimeleyo abavelisa umbane ukuze bakhe amaziko amatsha okuvelisa amandla ombane ococekileyo kwizikhululo zombane zaseMajuba naseTutuka eMpumalanga.

src_text: Aforika Borwa saenile Tšhata ka Phatwe.
tgt_text: Ezi zivumelwano zokuqeshisa ngomhlaba ziza kutsala utyalo-mali oluqikelelwa malunga nama-40 eebhiliyoni zeerandi.

Abatyali-zimali abane – i-HDF Energy South Africa, i-Red Rocket SA, i-Sola Group kunye ne-Mainstream Power Renewable Developments South Africa – baza kufaka ubuncinane iimegawathi ezingama-2 000 kwiziko lombane lesizwe.

src_text: Tšhata ya Tsamaiso e seng ya Bogareng tlamela letlhomeso go dinaga tsotlhe tse leng ditokololo setlankana sa kaedi ka ga tsamaiso e seng ya bogareng ya dithata le ditiro go tswa go puso ya bosešhaba go ya go makala mangwe puso.
tgt_text: La maziko matsha okuvelisa umbane kulindeleke ukuba aqhagamshelwe kuthungelwano lombane kwisithuba seenyanga ezingama-24 ukuya kwezingama-36 ukusuka kumhla wokutyikitywa kwezivumelwano zezimali, kodwa ke konke oku kuzakuxhomekeka kumaphepha-mvume endalo, okucandwa komhlaba kunye neminye imithetho enxulumene nolawulo lomhlaba.

src_text: Tšhata samagana bogolo le tsamaiso e seng ya bogareng ya thata le ditiro, letlhomeso la bobusi ba selegae le tlhabololo ya selegae..   Lekgotla la Boditšhaba la Ngwaga le Ngwaga la bo 32 la Pabalesego mo Diporong (IRSC).
tgt_text: Ukufumaneka kokutya.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse go tshwarwa ga Kopano ya Ngwaga le Ngwaga ya bo 32 ya IRSC kwa Johannesburg go tloga ka 1 go fitlha ka 6 Diphalane 2023 ka fa tlase ga setlhogo: “Poposešwa ya diporo mo Lefatsheng le le sa tlhomamisegeng”.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukusingathwa kweNkongolo ye-Agri SA yowama-2022 ePitoli ngomhla we-13 nowe-14 kweyeDwarha 2022 phantsi komxholo othi: “Silima Ukutya ekuHlaleni”.

src_text: RSC ke kopano sa boditšhaba e kopanyang dirutegi mo mererong ya pabalesego ya diporo go ralala lefatshe go abelana maitemogelo bona ka maikaelelo go tokafatsa pabalesego ya diporo..   Jaaka tokololo ya IRSC, Molaodi wa Taolo ya Diporo wa Aforika Borwa nnile moamogelabaeng wa kopano la bofelo ka.
tgt_text: Le nkongolo ibishukuxa imiba efana nokwenza izicwangciso eziphambili kwezolimo zisebenzele abalimi basekuhlaleni; iziseko zophuhliso ezizinzileyo zokutya okulinywa ekuhlaleni; ukwenza imo yendalo nokusingqongileyo kwendawo kukwazi ukugcina imveliso yokutya okuveliswa ekuhlaleni nakwixesha elizayo, kunye nokomeleza amandla abavelisi bokutya ukuze bakwazi ukuqhubeka nemveliso elinywe ekuhlaleni.

Ekubekeni phambili ukufumaneka kokutya, iKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukuphehlelelwa kweziko lesizwe lezoKhuseleko lwendalo i-National Biosecurity Hub, ngaphantsi kwenkqubo ye-Agricultural Bio-economy Innovation Partnership Programme, okuyinkqubo yeSebe lezeNzululwazi kunye nokuSungulwa Kwezinto eyenziwe ngentsebenziswano neYunivesithi yasePitoli.

src_text: Seralwa sa Leano la Mafaratlhatlha Bosetšhaba la 2050 (NIP 2050) Kgato ya bo.
tgt_text: Eli ziko liza kuxhasa uthintelo, ukuncitshiswa kunye nolawulo lwezifo zezityalo nezilwanyana, nto leyo eza kuba negalelo elihle ekwandeni kwemveliso, ukufumaneka kokutya kunye nophuhliso oluzinzileyo lwasemaphandleni   Izigqibo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse go phasaladiwa ga seralwa sa NIP 2050 Kgato ya bo 2 go ngoka ditshwaelo tsa baagi.
tgt_text: Ukuqinisekiswa koMqulu wokuNabisa amaGunya weManyano ye-Afrika (i-AU).

src_text: Leano le le neelana ka tsela ya go matlafatsa le go tlaleletsa diporojeke tsa puso tse di golaganeng..
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukungeniswa ePalamente koMqulu we-AU oqulathe iMithetho-siseko yokuNatyiswa Kwamagunya, uLawulo lweeNgingqi kunye noPhuhliso lwaseKhaya.

src_text: Le tlhagisa diporojeke tsa botlhokwa tsa mafelobonno batho; motlakase wa bommasepala; metsi; matlakala a popota; dipalangwa; mafaratlhatlha thuto le boitekanelo; mafaratlhatlha dijithale, le bosenyi le bobodu..   Popego ya leano le tlamela ka ponelopele ya karolo e tshwanetseng go lejwa tlamela ka tshekatsheko ya maemo ga jaana tlhalosa dipeelo tse di botlhokwa go netefatsa katlego le go tlhalosa tse di tshwanetseng go dirwa go fitlhelela ponelopele eo tshitshinya tsela ya tsenyotirisong e tshwanetseng go dirwa mo pakeng ya dingwaga tse tharo tsa leanotiro..   Letlhomeso la Bosetšhaba la Tsenyotirisong la go Dira Bodiredipuso ba Porofešenale.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika utyikitye lo mqulu kweyeThupha kowama-..   UMqulu wokuNabisa amaGunya ubonelela ngoxwebhu olusisikhokelo kuwo onke amazwe angamalungu e-AU, esi sikhokelo simalunga nokunatyiswa kwamagunya nemisebenzi yabasemagunyeni ukusuka kuzwelonke ukuya nakwamanye amanqanaba karhulumente.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse Letlhomeso la Bosetšhaba la Tsenyotirisong la go Dira Bodiredipuso ba Porofešenale.
tgt_text: Lo mqulu ujongene kakhulu nokwaba amagunya nemisebenzi, isikhokelo solawulo lwengingqi kunye nophuhliso lwengingqi.

src_text: Letlhomeso le le phasaladitswe ka 2021 go ngoka ditshwaelo tsa baagi..   Letlhomeso le le tlamela ka dipilara tse tlhano tsa ditsereganyo mo go direng Bodiredipuso ba porofešenale.
tgt_text: IBhunga  Lentlanganiso Yamazwe Ngamazwe yoKhuseleko kumzila kaloliwe ebanjwa rhoqo ngoNyaka yama-32  (i-IRSC).

src_text: Dipilara tse di akaretsa go ngoka le tlhaolo ya pele ga go tsena mo Bodiredipusong; peodinakong le tshimololo; thulaganyo le taolo ya tiragatso; thuto e tswelelang le tlhabololo ya porofešenale; le tlhatlogo ka maemo mo tirong le ditiragalo mo tirong..   Diphetogo mo Dipeelong tsa Tiro tsa Bakaedikakaretso (bo DG).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukusingathwa kweNtlanganiso ebanjwa rhoqo ngonyaka ye-IRSC yama-32 ezakubanjwa eRhawutini ukusuka ngomhla woku-1 ukuya kowesi-6 kweyeDwarha 2023 phantsi komxholo othi: “Ukubunjwa ngokutsha koololiwe kwiHlabathi elingenakuqinisekiswa”.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse pegelo e tshitshinyang mekgwa ya go matlafatsa nonofo le bokgoni ba bo DG mo Bodiredipusong.
tgt_text: I-IRSC liqonga lamazwe ngamazwe elidibanisa iingcali zokhuseleko koololiwe ezivela kwihlabathi liphela ukuze zitshintshiselane ngamava ngeenjongo zokuphucula ukhuseleko lukaloliwe.

src_text: Pegelo e dirile ditshitshinyo di le mmalwa, go akaretsa paka ya tiro ya bo DG le taolo ya maatlatiro ka Bothati ba Khuduthamaga go bantlhankedi ba ba rweleng maikarabelo..   Pegelo e tshitshintse gape gore DG mo Kantorong ya Moporesitente tla tsewa gape le Tlhogo ya Botsamaisi ba Puso.
tgt_text: Njengelungu le-IRSC, uMlawuli woKhuseleko kuLoliwe waseMzantsi Afrika ugqibele ukusingatha le ndibano ngo-.

src_text: Mo diporofenseng, tiro e tla newa oDG ba ba mo dikantorong tsa Ditonakgolo.
tgt_text: UYilo lwesiCwangciso seSizwe seZiseko zoPhuhliso sowama-2050 (i-NIP 2050) iSigaba sesi-.

src_text: Pegelo e tshitshintse gape mekgwa ya go kaela mafapha ka ga taolo ya dikonteraka tsa bo DG..   Tsamaiso ya Taolo ya Tiragatso ntšhwa ya bo DG a tlhabololwa go nyalanya le diphetogo tse di dumeletsweng..   Tona ya Nama-o-Tshwere ya Bodiredipuso le Botsamaisi, Rre Thulas Nxesi tla bitsa kopano ya bobegakgang mo bekeng e tlang go tlhalosa Letlhomeso la Bosetšhaba la Tsenyotirisong la go Dira Bodiredipuso ba Porofešenale le go tlhagisa gape le diphetogo tse di letleletsweng mo dipeelong tsa tiro ya bo DG..   Pegelo ya Botlhano ya Tswelopele mo Tsenyotirisong ya Lekwalopuso la Mabudusatsela ka ga Ditshwanelo tsa Batho ba ba nang le Bogole (WPRPD) ya 2020-.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukupapashwa koyilo lwe-NIP 2050 iSigaba sesi-2  kwiphephandaba likarhulumente ukuze nalo uluntu luhlomle.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse Pegelo ya Botlhano ya Tswelopele mo Tsenyotirisong ya WPRPD e tlhagisang peodinakong ka go tsenngwa tirisong ga WPRPD.
tgt_text: Esi sicwangciso sinika umkhombandlela ekomelezeni nasekwandiseni iiprojekthi ezihlangeneyo zeqhinga likarhulumente.

src_text: Pegelo e akaretsa ditshitshinyo go tswa go mafapha puso bosetšhaba le diporofense tlamela ka peodinakong ka ga tsenyotiriosong ya pholisi e akaretsang kabo ya matlole..   Pegelongwaga ya ntlha ya tswelopele phasaladitswe ka.
tgt_text: Ichonga iiprojekthi ezicwangcisiweyo zokuhlaliswa koluntu; umbane kamasipala; amanzi; inkunkuma nelindle; izithuthi zabakhweli; iziseko zamaziko emfundo nezempilo; iziseko ezingundoqo zobuchwephesha, ulwaphulo-mthetho norhwaphilizo.

src_text: Pegelo ya Tswelopele ya botlhano letleletswe go phasaladiwa ka kuranta ya puso ke Lefapha la Basadi, Bašwa le Batho ba ba nang le Bogole.
tgt_text: Ubume besicwangciso bucacisa ngombono wenkalo ekufuneka kujongwane nayo, bunikezela ngovavanyo lwemeko yangoku, buchaza iimeko eziyimfuneko ukuze kubekho impumelelo kwaye buchaza ekufuneka kwenziwe ukufezekisa umbono lowo.
INkqubo-sikhokelo yeSizwe yokuPhumeza uBungcali beNkonzo kaRhulumente.

src_text: Tokafatso ya Athikele 20(1) ya Tumelano ka ga go Fedisiwa ga Mefuta yotlhe ya Kgethololo Kgatlhanong le Basadi (CEDAW).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivume iNkqubo-sikhokelo yeSizwe yokuPhumeza uBungcali beNkonzo  kaRhulumente.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletse go romelwa kwa Palamenteng ga tokafatso ya Athikele 20(1) ya CEDAW gore mametlelelwe.
tgt_text: Le nkqubo-sikhokelo yapapashwa ngowama-2021 ukuze kuboniswane noluntu..   Esi sicwangciso-nkqubo sibonelela ngeentsika ezintlanu ezizama ukungenelela ngoncedo lokwenza iNkonzo kaRhulumente ibe nobungcali.

src_text: Diphetogo tse di tlamela ka paka e okeditsweng ya dikopano tsa komiti e sekasekang dipegelo tsa dinaga tse leng ditokololo..   Aforika Borwa saenile tumelano ka 1993 le go mametlelela ka Sedimonthole.
tgt_text: Ezi ntsika zibandakanya ukuhlolwa nokuchongwa kwangaphambi kokungena emsebenzini komntu osele ekwiNkonzo kaRhulumente; uqeqesho loqhelaniso nomsebenzi; ucwangciso nolawulo lwentsebenzo; ukuqhubeka nemfundo kunye nophuhliso lobungcali, kunye nenkqubela phambili yekhondo lomsebenzi kunye nokujonga iimeko zamakhondo emisebenzi.

src_text: Go romelwa kwa Palamenteng go senka go golaganya tumelano e mametleletsweng mo malobeng le tokafatso ya Athikele 20(1) ya tumelano .
tgt_text: Utshintsho kwiimeko zengqesho kuBalawuli-Jikelele (ii-DG).

src_text: Tumelano ya Dinaga tsa Lefatshe ka ga Kamogelo ya Makwalothuto Tebang le Thuto Kgolwane.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyamkele ingxelo ephakamisa amanyathelo okomeleza amandla kunye nokukwazi ukusebenza kwabo bakwisihlalo sika-DG kwiNkonzo kaRhulumente.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse go romelwa kwa Palamenteng ga Tumelano ya Dinaga tsa Lefatshe ka ga Kamogelo ya Makwalothuto tebang le Thuto Kgolwane gore tsenngwe molaong semmuso.
tgt_text: Ingxelo yenze izindululo ezininzi, kubandakanywa ixesha lokulawula lee-DG kunye nendlela elandelwa ngayo imiyalelo yamaLungu esiGqeba soLawulo  ngamagosa aphendulayo.

src_text: Fa sena go tsenngwa molaong semmuso tla romelwa go Mokgatlo wa Thuto, Saenthifiki le Setso wa Ditšhabakopano (UN) le mono gae tla nna karolo ya Molao wa Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro la Naga la Makwalothuto wa ngwaga wa 2008 (Molao wa bo 67 wa 2008)..   Tumelano eno ya Dinaga tsa Lefatshe tlhoma melawana ya lefatshe ka bophara ya Kamogelo ya makwalothuto ditheo tsa thuto kgolwane le makwalothuto mangwe ka go dira gore lefatshe ka bophara go se nne le makwalothotu a sa tseeweng tsiya a nang le lehunelo, le a sa tlhaolweng.
tgt_text: Le ngxelo ikwandulule ukuba i-DG kwi-Ofisi kaMongameli yonyulwe njengeNtloko yoLawulo Lwemisebenzi kaRhulumente.

src_text: Tumelano eno neela tetla ya gore makwalothuto dinaga disele mo dinageng tse 193 tse leng ditokololo tsa UN amogelwe ke dinaga tseno..   Kgogelomorago ya Ditokafatso mo Kaeding ya Maloko Khuduthamaga.
tgt_text: Kwinqanaba lamaphondo, lo msebenzi uza kunikwa ii-DG kwii-ofisi zeeNkulumbuso.

src_text: Kabinete tlhomamisitse pegelo e dirilweng ke Kantoro ya ga Moporesitente ka Mosupologo, 17 Diphalane 2022 go gogela morago diphetogo tse di dirilweng tsa 2022 mo Kaeding ya Maloko Khuduthamaga e bidiwang gape Bukana ya Ditona..   Ditokafatso tse di dirilweng ka Moranang 2022 di tlamela ka mothamo o okeditsweng mo dikantorong tse dingwe tsa Ditona tse di nang le maikarabelo makala feta bongwe.
tgt_text: Ingxelo iphinde yaphakamisa amanyathelo okukhokela amasebe kulawulo lwezivumelwano zengqesho zee-DG.

src_text: Di ne di tlhagisa gape gore Puso tshwanetse go rwala maikarabelo ka botlalo ditshenyegelo tse di jaaka tlamelo ya motlakase le metsi kwa mafelobonnong semmuso maloko khuduthamaga..   Kabinete etse tlhoko dingongorego tsa baagi mme sweditse go leba sešwa Kaedi ya Maloko Khuduthamaga.
tgt_text: Inkqubo ehlaziyiweyo yoLawulo lweNtsebenzo yee-DG iyahlaziywa ukuze ihambelane nolu tshintsho lwenziweyo.

src_text: Tiragalo e tla dirwa ke setheo se se ikemetseng mme fa sena go konosediwa, kaedi e tla phasaladiwa mo webosaeteng ya Lefapha la Bodiredipuso le Botsamaisi: www.dpsa.gov.za..  Semphato sa Phetogo e Lolameng sa Maatla (JETP) le Leano la JETP (JEPT-IP).
tgt_text: UMphathiswa oBambeleyo wezaBasebenzi bakaRhulumente noLawulo, uMnu Thulas Nxesi, kule veki izayo uza kubiza intlanganiso noonondaba ukuze achaze iNkqubo-sikhokelo yeSizwe yokuPhunyezwa kobuNgcali beNkonzo kaRhulumente kunye nokucacisa utshintsho oluvunyiweyo kwiimeko zengqesho yee-DG.

src_text: Morago ga go amogela tlhagisetso ya JEPT le JETP-IP, Kabinete ne ya mametlelela JETP-IP le go supa ditebogo ka tiro e botlalo e dirilweng go tlhagisa..   JETP-IP tlhalosa dipeeletso tse di tlhokegang go fitlhelela boineelo ba Puso ya Aforika Borwa ba go fedisa khabone le go tsweletsa kgolo e tswelelang, le go netefatsa phetogo e lolameng go badiri le mafelo a amegang..   Komiti ya Ditona ya Phetogo ya Tlelaemete tla tshwara kopano ya bobegakgang mo nakong e sa fediseng pelo go neela ka dintlha ka botlalo   Melaotlhomo.
tgt_text: Ingxelo yesihlanu yeNkqubela-phambili engokuphunyezwa kwePhepha leNgcaciso yoMgaqo-nkqubo waMalungelo Abantu abaPhila nokuKhubazeka (i-WPRPD) yama-2020-.

src_text: Molaotlhomo wa Thomelo ya Dithoto ka Dikepe wa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyivumile ingxelo yesihlanu yeNkqubela-phambili engokuphunyezwa kwePhepha leNgcaciso yoMgaqo-nkqubo waMalungelo Abantu abaPhila nokuKhubazeka (i-WPRPD), ibonelela ngohlaziyo lokuphunyezwa kwe-WPRPD.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse go romelwa ga Molaotlhomo wa Thomelo ya Dithoto ka Dikepe wa 2022 kwa Palamenteng go diragadiwa.
tgt_text: Le ngxelo ibandakanya amagalelo avela kumasebe kazwelonke nawephondo.

src_text: Molaotlhomo o tlhabolola Molao wa Thomelo ya Dithoto ka Dikepe, 1957 (Molao 57 wa 1951) o setseng le dingwaga di le.
tgt_text: Ikwanika ingxelo ngomiliselo lomgaqo-nkqubo olubandakanya ulwabiwo lohlahlo-mali.
Ingxelo yokuqala yenkqubela-phambili eye inikezwe rhoqo ngonyaka yapapashwa ngowama-.

src_text: Fa sena go amogelwa jaaka molao, Molaotlhomo o tla tlamela ka letlhomeso la semolao go laola tsamaiso ya boleng ya dikepe.
tgt_text: Le ngxelo yesihlanu yenkqubela-phambili ivunyiwe ukuba ifakwe kwigazethi ize ipapashwe liSebe labaseTyhini, uLutsha kunye naBantu abaKhubazekileyo.

src_text: Gareng ga tse dingwe tla laola popego, kwadiso, maina le go fedisiwa ga dikepe..   Diphetogo tse di tla nna le seabe mo go tsosoloseng lekala la tsamaiso ya dithoto ka dikepe gammogo le go nyalanya naga le Tumelano ya Mokgatlo wa Boditšhaba wa Pharakano ya Dikepe.
tgt_text: Ukulungiswa kweSiqendu sama-20(1) seSivumelwano sokuPheliswa Kwazo Zonke iiNtlobo zoCalucalulo Olujoliswe kwabaseTyhini (i-CEDAW).

src_text: Aforika Borwa mametleletse tumelano     .
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukungeniswa ePalamente kwesilungiso seSiqendu sama-20(1) se-CEDAW ukuze samkelwe yiPalamente.

src_text: Molaotlhomo wa Tokafatso ya Dipalopalo wa.
tgt_text: Ezi zihlomelo zibonelela ngexesha elongezelelweyo leentlanganiso zekomiti ejonga iingxelo zamazwe angamalungu.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse go romelwa kwa Palamenteng ga Molaotlhomo wa Tokafatso ya Dipalopalo wa 2022 gore tswelediwe.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika wasityikitya esi sivumelwano ngowe-1993 waza emva koko wasiphumeza kweyoMnga ngowama-.

src_text: Molaotlhomo o tshitshinya tokafatso ya Molao wa Ditlhopho, 1999 (Molao 6 wa 1999).
tgt_text: Ukungeniswa kwesi silungiso ePalamente kujonge ukulungelelanisa isivumelwano esamkelwa ngaphambili kunye nolungiso kwiSiqendu sama-20(1) sesivumelwano.

src_text: Diphetogo di tlamela ka tlhabololo le tsenyotirisong ya Tsamaiso ya Bosetšhaba ya Dipalopalo e tshegetsang ditshwetso tse di tshegediwang ke bopaki..   Di matlafatsa kgolagano magareng ga Setheo sa Dipalopalo sa Aforika Borwa le ditheo tse dingwe tsa puso, le go atolosa letlhomeso la taolo la Molao D.  Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.
tgt_text: Isivumelwano seHlabathi sokwaMkelwa kweziQinisekiso zeMfundo ePhakamileyo.

src_text: Samiti ya Moporesitente ya Dikgwebopotlana, tse Dinnye le tse di Magareng (SMME) le Dikoporasi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukungeniswa ePalamente kwesiVumelwano seHlabathi soKwamkelwa kweziQinisekiso eziphathelene neMfundo ePhakamileyo ukuze siqinisekiswe yiPalamente.

src_text: Lefapha la Tlhabololo ya Dikgwebopotlana, ka tirisano le bannaleseabe ba lekala la poraefete, le tla tshwara Samiti ya SMME le Dikoporasi ya Moporesitente ya Bosetšhaba kwa Bryanston, Gauteng ka 13 go fitlha ka 15 Ngwanatsele..   Samiti e tla kopanya bannaleseabe ba botlhokwa ba lekala la poraefete le la puso mo tikologong ya dikgwebopotlana go rerisana ka go senka ditsela tsa go dirisana mmogo go matlafatsa lekala le.
tgt_text: Sakuba sivunyiwe siza kuthunyelwa kuMbutho wezeMfundo, ezeNzululwazi neNkcubeko weZizwe eziManyeneyo  (i-UNESCO) emva koko unikwe amandla okusebenza ngokoMthetho weli lizwe weNkqubo-sikhokelo kaZwelonke yeziQinisekiso, wowama-2008 (uMthetho wama-67 wama-2008).

src_text: Bannaleseabe ba ba solofelwang ba akaretsa mekgatlo ya kgwebo, badiri ba diSMME, dirutegi, badiri ba dipholisi le ditheo tsa tlhabololo ya matlole..     Samiti tla rerisana gape le ka ga Leanolegolo le le Momaganeng la Bosetšhaba la Tlhabololo ya Dikgwebopotlana, le le tlamelang ka letlhomeso le le botlhokwa go matlafatsa lekala la SMME.
tgt_text: Isivumelwano sehlabathi sisungula imigaqo-jikelele yemfundo enobulungisa, eselubala nengenamkhethe kwiziqinisekiso zemfundo ephakamileyo.

src_text: Samiti e solofelwa gape go thankgolola Dikabo tsa Bosetšhaba tsa SMME tsa Moporesitente tsa Ngwaga le Ngwaga..     Go Tshwarwa ga Samiti ya Moporesitente ya 2022 ya Tirisodikgoka e Ikaegileng ka Bong le Polao ya Basadi (GBVF).
tgt_text: Esi sivumelwano senzelwe ukukwamkelwa kweziqinisekiso zemfundo zamazwe angaphandle kumazwe angamalungu e-UN ali-.

src_text: Moporesitente Ramaphosa tla tshwara Samiti ya bobedi ya Moporesitente ya GBVF kwa Gallagher Convention Centre mo Gauteng ka 1 le 2 Ngwanatsele.
tgt_text: Ukurhoxiswa kwezilungiso kwiSikhokelo saMalungu eSigqeba esiPhezulu.

src_text: Samiti ya ntlha e neng tshwerwe ka 2018 ne ya dirisiwa go supa boineelo gape ba puso le balekane ba loago mo go fediseng ditiragalo tse di kwa godimo tsa tirisodikgoka kgatlhanong le basadi mo nageng..   Samiti ya bobedi tla dirisiwa go lekola Tswelopele e dirilweng mo go tsenngweng tirisong ga Togamaano ya Bosetšhaba ka ga GBVF tla tshwarwa ka fa tlase ga setlhogo: “Boikarabelo; Itlhaganediso le Kgodiso JAANONG”..   Samiti e tla sekaseka gareng ga tse dingwe, go batla ditsela tsa go itlhaganedisa dikgato le maikarabelo go tswa go mafapha botlhokwa le bannaleseabe ba ba akaretsang baagi, lekala la poraefete le mekgatlo ya badiri..   Pitso ya Botlhano ya ga Moporesitente kwa Kapa Botlhaba.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi isivumile isibhengezo esenziwe yi-Ofisi kaMongameli ngoMvulo, umhla we-17 kweyeDwarha 2022 sokurhoxisa izihlomelo ezenziwe kwiSikhokelo saMalungu esiGqeba esiLawulayo, esikwabizwa ngokuba yiNcwadana yabaPhathiswa, yowama-..   Izihlomelo ezenziwe ngenyanga kaTshazimpuzi kowama-2022 ziphakamise ukuba kongezwe inani labasebenzi kwezinye zee-ofisi zabaPhathiswa abaphethe amasebe amaninzi.

src_text: Pitso ya Botlhano ya Mokgwa wa Tlhabololo ya Sedika (DDM) ya ga Moporesitente kwa Upington, Kapa Botlhaba tla diragala ka Labotlhano, 21 Diphalane 2022 kwa Setediamong sa selegae sa Mxolisi Dicky Jacobs..   Pitso ya Moporesitente ya DDM tla lekola tswelelo ya thebolelo ya ditirelo le dikgwetlho kwa Kapa Botlhaba le go tsereganya go di rarabolola.
tgt_text: Ezi zihlomelo zikwafuna ukuba uRhulumente ahlawule zonke iindleko  ezinxulumene nombane namanzi kwiindawo zikarhulumente ezihlala amalungu esigqeba.

src_text: DDM netefatsa gore thulaganyo, tsenyotirisong le kabelomatlole ya thebolelo ya ditirelo di momagantswe go tokafatsa thebolelo ya ditirelo go baagi..   Jaaka matlhagolatsela Pitso e, Ditona, maloko dikhuduthamaga le bommeyara ba tla tswa letsholo go ya kwa baaging ba kwa Upington le mafelo a mabapi..   Puo ya Pholisi ya Maano go Rulaganyetsa Tiriso ya Matlole mo Pakeng ya Dikgwedi di le Tharo (MTBPS).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iziqaphele iinkxalabo eziphakanyiswe luluntu yaze yagqiba ekubeni iphonononge iSikhokelo saMalungu esiGqeba soLawulo.

src_text: Kabinete dumela gore MTBPS ya 2022 e tla alwang ke Tona ya Matlotlo Enoch Godongwana ka Laboraro, 26 Diphalane 2022 ke karolo e botlhokwa ya tsamaiso e bulegileng ya Aforika Borwa ya tekanyetsokabo e maikarabelo..   MTBPS tlhalosa boineelo ba puso mo teng ga maemo palogotlhe ya tiriso ya matlole naga ka kgonang tlhalosa gape le gore puso tla tswala jang mokhino fa gare ga lotseno le ditshenyegelo, le go dirisa matlotlo a leng teng ka tshwanelo.
tgt_text: Le nkqubo iza kusingathwa liqela elingathathi cala kwaye emva kokuba igqityiwe, esi sikhokelo siza kwenziwa esidlangalaleni ngewebhusayithi yeSebe lezaBasebenzi bakaRhulumente kunye noLawulo:  www.dpsa.gov.za.
Intsebenziswano Kutshintsho Nobulungisa Kwezamandla (i-JETP) kunye neSicwangciso soTyalo-mali lwe-JETP (i-JETP-IP).

src_text: Ditlhatlhobo tsa Materiki.
tgt_text: Emva kokwamkela intetho nge-JETP kunye ne-JETP-IP, iKhabhinethi yamkele i-JETP-IP yaza yavakalisa umbulelo wayo ngomsebenzi oneenkcukacha ezicacileyo owenziweyo wokuyiphuhlisa.

src_text: Ditlhatlhobo tsa Setifikheiti se Segolwane sa Bosetšhaba di simolola ka 31 Diphalane go fitlha ka 7 Sedimonthole.
tgt_text: I-JETP-IP ichaza utyalo-mali olufunekayo ukuze kuphunyezwe izibophelelo zokungangcolisi umoya ezenziwe nguRhulumente waseMzantsi Afrika ngelixa ekhuthaza uphuhliso oluzinzileyo, kunye nokuqinisekisa utshintsho olunobulungisa kubasebenzi kunye noluntu oluchaphazelekayo.

src_text: Kabinete eleletsa setlhopha sa 2022 masego jaaka ba tla bo ba samagana le legato la bofelo la leeto la bona la sekolo.
tgt_text: Kungekudala Ikomiti yabaPhathiswa ejongene noTshintsho lweMozulu iza kubamba indibano noonondaba ukuze inike iinkcukacha ezithe vetshe ngale nkqubo   Imithetho Esayilwayo.

src_text: Tshegetso e tswelelang go tswa go barutisi, batsadi le batlhokomedi tla nna botlhokwa thata mo go thuseng baithuti ba go samagana le ditlhatlhobo tse ka boitshepo..   Kabinete ikuela go batsadi le batlhokomedi go nna le seabe ka go rotloetsa le go tlhotlheletsa baithuti, gammogo le go tlhola tikologo e siametseng go ithuta kwa gae..   Khonferense ya Leanotlhabololo la Bosetšhaba (NDP) le Bokgoni ba Naga.
tgt_text: UMthetho osaYilwayo wokuHanjiswa kweeMveliso zoRhwebo  ngeeNqanawa wango-.

src_text: Lefapha le Bodiredipuso le Botsamaisi ka semphato le Khomišene ya Bosetšhaba ya Togamaano le Lefapha la Dithuto tsa Tlhabololo la Yunibesithi ya KwaZulu-Natal, le tla tshwara khonferense ya NDP le Bokgoni ba Naga go tloga ka 7 go fitlha ka 9 Ngwanatsele 2022 kwa Khamphaseng ya Kholeji ya Howard ya Yunibesithi ya KwaZulu-Natal..   Khonferense e tla lekola bokgoni le tiragatso ya puso mo dingwageng tse 10 tsa ntlha tsa NDP, mme tla tshwarwa ka fa tlase ga setlhogo: “Tekolo ya Bokgoni ba Naga le Tiragatso ya Puso mo dingwageng tse lesome tsa ntlha tsa NDP”..   Go Neelwa Setifikheiti sa Bogosi go Kgosi Misuzulu kaZwelithini.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukungeniswa ePalamente koMthetho osaYilwayo wokuHanjiswa kweeMveliso zoRhwebo  ngeeNqanawa wango-2022 ukuze uphicothwe.

src_text: Moporesitente Ramaphosa tla neela Setifikheiti sa Bogosi go Motlotlegi Kgosi Misuzulu kaZwelithini kwa Lebaleng la Metshameko la Moses Mabhida kwa Durban ka Lamatlhatso, 29 Diphalane..
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho usaYilwayo ungena endaweni yoMthetho wokuHanjiswa kweeMveliso zoRhwebo ngeeNqanawa wowe-1951 (uMthetho 57 wowe-1951), obusele uneminyaka engama-70 uqhuba..   Wakuba uphunyeziwe, lo Mthetho uYilwayo uza kubonelela ngenkqubo-sikhokelo yomthetho wokuthumela intengiso ngeenqanawa ozakulawula ikhonkco lokuthumela iimpahla ngeenqanawa.

src_text: Se se latela moletlo wa setso wa go tlhoma kgosi wa “Ukungena eSibayeni” wa Kgosi o neng tshwerwe ka 20 Phatwe 2022 o mo tlhatloseditseng mo setulong sa bogosi jaaka Kgosi ya Setšhaba sa amaZulu   Melaetsa.
tgt_text: Iza kulawula, phakathi kwezinye izinto, ukuyilwa, ukubhaliswa, ukuthiywa kwamagama kunye nokuchithwa kweenqanawa.

src_text: Go akgolaKabinete akgola le go eleletsa masego: Rre Sam Matekane, Rre yo tlhophilweng go nna Tonakgolo ya Puso ya Lesotho.
tgt_text: Olu tshintsho luza kuba negalelo ekuvuseleleni icandelo lezothutho lwaselwandle kunye nokulungelelanisa eli lizwe libe kwizinga leZizwe ngeZizwe loMbutho waseLwandle.

src_text: Kabinete gape inyalantse le Setlhopha sa Tshekatsheko ya Ditlhopho sa AU kwa Ditlhophong tsa Kokoanobosetšhaba kwa Pusong ya Lesotho ka la bo 7 Diphalane 2022 mo go akgoleng tsepamo ya ditlhopho le sepolotiki ya Batho ba Puso ya Lesotho go bo ba tshwere ditlhopho tse di atlegileng.

Aforika Borwa tswelela go ineela mo go matlafatseng le go tiiseng dikamano tsa sebedi gammogo le go kgontsha tirisano mo mererong ya dikgatlhegelo tse di tshwanang mo kgaolong, kontinente le go ralala lefatshe..   Matshediso Kabinete rometse melaetsa ya matshidiso go lelapa le ditsala tsa ga: Rre Albert Nolan (88), Moperisita wa Catholic ya Aforika Borwa yo boineelo yo neng gwetlha dikakanyo tsa sedumedi tse di neng di batla go mametlelela tsamaiso ya tlhaolele.
tgt_text: UMthetho-sihlomelo osaYilwayo weNkcukacha-manani wowama-.

src_text: Ka 2003, Moporesitente wa nako eo Thabo Mbeki ne mo neela Kabo ya Luthuli ya Selefera ka ntlha ya “boineelo ba gagwe ba botshelo botlhe go kgaratlhela temokerasi, ditshwanelo tsa botho le bosiamisi le go gwetlha tsamaiso ya sedumedi go akaretsa mametlelelo ya tlhaolele ka tsela ya sedumedi.”   Go Thapiwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukungeniswa ePalamente koMthetho-siHlomelo oYilwayo weNkcukacha-manani wowama-2022 ukuze uphicothwe.

src_text: Pele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang   Atefokheiti James Mlawu – Mokaedikakaretso: Lefapha la Dipalangwa   Rre Shabeer Khan – Ramatlotlo-Kakaretso: Matlotlo Bosetšhaba.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo uphakamisa isihlomelo kuMthetho weeNkcukacha-manani, wowe-1999 (uMthetho wesi-6 wowe-1999).

src_text: Kabinete dumalane le go thapiwa ga ba ba latelang:.
tgt_text: Ezi zihlomelo zibonelela ngophuhliso nokusetyenziswa kweNkqubo yeNkcukacha-manani yeSizwe exhasa izigqibo ezisekelwe kwiinkcukacha ezinobungqina.

src_text: Maloko Boto ya Bojanala ya Aforika Borwa   Ngaka Nondumiso Maphazi (Monnasetilo)   Ngaka Aubrey Mhlongo (Motlatsa Monnasetilo)   Mme Pretty Ntombela   Mme Nomahlubi Mazwai   Rre Odwa Mtati   Rre Ravi Nadasen thapilwe gape)   Rre Enver Duminy thapilwe gape)   Mme Nandipha Mzileni Mbulawa   Rre Mduduzi Zakwe thapilwe gape)   Mme Rosemary Anderson   Mme Lehlohonolo Rapodile; lel.
tgt_text: Ezi zihlomelo ziqinisa ulungelelwaniso olukhoyo phakathi kweziko leeNkcukacha-manani yoMzantsi Afrika (i-Stats SA) kunye namanye amaziko karhulumente, kwaye zandise ubume bolawulo lwalo Mthetho   Imisitho Ezayo.

src_text: Mme Nonkqubela Silulwane (Moemedi wa lefapha).
tgt_text: Ingqungquthela kaMongameli yeSizwe yamaShishini amaNcinci, amaNcinane naPhakathi (ii-SMME) kunye nooKopolotyeni.

src_text: Maloko Boto ya Koporasi ya Taolo ya Pharakano ya Ditsela   Ngaka Eddie Mogalefi Thebe thapilwe gape)   Mme Thandi Clara Thankge thapilwe gape)   Moporofesara Maredi Mphahlele   Mme Nomusa Mufamadi (Monnasetilo)   Atefokheiti Xola Stemela   Mme Lerato Magalo   Moporofesara Chitja Twala   Rre Nkumeleni John Kudzingana   Mme Jaxa (Leloko la thefosano); le   Mme HM Mbanyele-Ntshinga (Leloko la thefosano).
tgt_text: ISebe loPhuhliso lwamaShishini amaNcinci, lisebenzisana namahlakani ecandelo labucala, liza kubamba iNgqungquthela kaMongameli yeSizwe yee-SMME  kunye nooKopolotyeni e-Bryanston, e-Gauteng ukususela ngomhla we-13 ukuya kowe-15 kweyeNkanga..

src_text: Rre Tshepo Monaheng – Motlhankedi Khuduthamaga (CEO): Setlamo sa Aforika Borwa sa Merero ya Dikgwa (Konteraka ntšhwafaditswe sebaka sa dingwaga tse tharo (3)).
tgt_text: Le ngqungquthela iza kudibanisa ndawonye abathathi-nxaxheba abaphambili becandelo labucala nelikarhulumente kwikhonkco lamashishini amancinci, ukuze baxoxe ngokufumana iindlela zokusebenzisana ekomelezeni eli candelo.

src_text: Rre Reginald Lavhelesani Demana – CEO: Setheo sa Bosetšhaba sa Ditsela sa Aforika Borwa..   Mme Ditebogo Kgomo – CEO: Molaodi wa Nutlere wa Bosetšhaba..   Rre Risenga Maluleka – Radipalopalo-Kakaretso (Ntšhwafatso ya Konteraka).
tgt_text: Abathathi-nxaxheba abalindelekileyo baquka amagumbi orhwebo, iingcali ze-SMME, izifundiswa, abenzi bomgaqo-nkqubo kunye namaziko emali yophuhliso.

src_text: Samiti ya Moporesitente e ka ga Tirisodikgoka e Totileng Batho ba Bong jo bo Rileng le Dipolao tsa Basadi (GBVF).
tgt_text: Issues in the environment.

src_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke go tshwarwa ga Samiti ya Moporesitente e ka ga GBVF kwa Gallagher Estate kwa Midrand, Gauteng ka la bo 1 le la bo 2 Ngwanaitseele 2022 ka molaetsamogolo yo reng: “Go Rwala Maikarabelo, Go Potlakisa Twantsho ya Ditiro Tseno mmogo le Go Dira Modumo ka Tsona, GONA JAANONG!”.
tgt_text: Presidential Summit on Gender-Based Violence and Femicide (GBVF).
